title: Fullstack Application Developer
description:
#### **Who we are**


At 55 Degrees, we believe in doing great work without unnecessary stress. Based in the heart of Malmö, Sweden, we develop powerful applications that help teams worldwide work smarter, plan and forecast better, and stay focused on what truly matters. But what makes us special isn’t just our products—it’s our people.


We’re a team of curious, creative, and passionate individuals who believe in delivering exceptional products while maintaining a healthy balance in our lives. We value being happy at work and with our colleagues, and we ensure that work is as enjoyable as it is impactful. Our diverse and inclusive culture fosters collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning. All our employees are encouraged to suggest activities and run projects to take us forward on our journey!

#### **The role**


We are looking for a Fullstack Application Developer with 3–5 years of experience to strengthen our growing team. You’ll work across frontend and backend, helping us build high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly applications.


This is an opportunity to join a quickly growing team and make a significant impact from day one. You will report directly to our Engineering manager and collaborate closely with both product and design.

##### **Key Responsibilities**

* Develop, maintain, and improve fullstack applications using React, Express, and TypeScript.
* Design and implement backend services with AWS (DynamoDB, Elastic Beanstalk, EC2, or similar).
* Take ownership of projects from design through delivery and ongoing maintenance.
* Collaborate with team members across engineering, product, and design to deliver value quickly.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code.

**Examples of duties include, but are not limited to:**

  

* Leading the development of new features and applications.
* Building and optimizing APIs.
* Managing data storage solutions in AWS.
* Supporting deployment and scaling of services.
* Performing code reviews.
* Troubleshooting and solving technical issues in production.

#### **About you**


To succeed in this role, you must be both technically strong and an excellent communicator. You thrive in a small company environment and are motivated to contribute to the growth and development of our products. We’d love to hear from you if the following describes you:

* Team player with a passion for collaboration, supporting others and sharing your knowledge.
* A doer with high-quality standards and an eye for detail.
* Proactive problem solver who takes ownership and seeks opportunities to improve.
* Strong communicator, able to explain complex technical concepts clearly.
* Experienced in leading projects and comfortable taking initiative.

**Your day one qualities:**

  

* 3–5 years of experience in fullstack development.
* Solid skills in React, Express, and TypeScript.
* Experience with AWS (DynamoDB, EC2, Elastic Beanstalk, or similar cloud services).
* Background in SaaS product development.
* Data-driven mindset, comfortable tracking and presenting results.
* Fluent English at a professional level in writing and speaking; other languages are a bonus!

**We’ll be excited if you…**

* Have an understanding of lean/agile methodologies and flow-based practices.
* Have experience with the Atlassian suite of tools, particularly Jira and Confluence.
* Have worked with Azure DevOps or its APIs.

#### **What we offer you**

* Hybrid-remote work
* Flexible hours
* 6 weeks prepaid vacation
* Occupational pension according to ITP plan
* Health insurance
* ‍️ Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK / year
* Bus/train ticket benefit for those who prefer to commute
* Breakfast & Fika - Crackers and fika are always close at hand
* ‍️ Volunteer days - 3 paid days off per year to volunteer for a charity of choice
* Join regular after works and happenings!
* Team spirit - become part of a tight and successful team
* An individual learning & development plan

#### **Apply Now!**

At 55 Degrees, you will learn from a small but amazingly talented group of professionals. You will experience transparency in all aspects of the organization. With 55 Degrees, you will have the opportunity to grow and develop.


Join our team and shape the future of 55 Degrees by applying now. We offer a great compensation and benefits package, and the chance to work with dedicated and talented colleagues. Interviews are ongoing, and the position will be filled as soon as we find the perfect match!

##### **What to expect after sending in your application?**

* Our Director of Operations, Michelle, will be your first point of contact and will keep you up to date on the process. Should you have any questions, feel free to reach out to Michelle at michelle@55degrees.se
* During the process, you’ll first have an intro call, and after that, you’ll get to meet the team in two separate discussions.
* Finally, after the discussions, we’ll make you a job offer.
* Welcome to 55 Degrees – we are looking forward to working with you!

title: Developer - Backend
description:
Lysa’s vision is to set a new standard in savings through automation, efficiency and an unwavering dedication to our customers' best interests. We believe that many institutions work against their customers and we see a significant opportunity to establish a new financial champion. We are on a mission to make it simpler for people to save smarter. To achieve this, we need to continuously develop our product and expand into new markets. We have an outstanding team, but to further accelerate growth, we need more talented colleagues. We are currently seeking a Developer - Backend to join our team.

##### **The opportunity**


From concept to deployment, you'll have a direct hand in creating features for our customers and colleagues. Collaborating closely with product managers, designers, legal experts, and customer service, you'll see your ideas come to life and make a real difference.


You thrive on turning ideas into user-loved features and likely have the following background:

* A solid foundation in software development, with experience in Java or similar languages
* Experience of microservices
* Experience of applications running on cloud platforms such as AWS and distributed systems
* 

Technologies that we love at Lysa:

* Java
* Spring-boot
* Spring-cloud
* PostgreSQL
* Redis
* 

We are continuously updating to the latest versions to stay at the forefront of technology.


As a colleague, we believe you share Lysa’s values: Earn trust, Add value, Have grit. You enjoy working in a cross-functional environment and strive to build efficient collaborations across the organisation.

##### **What we offer**


Lysa offers a unique opportunity to work at the forefront of the financial industry by creating a better way to save and invest.


At Lysa, we cherish:

* A supportive Team environment: Where team members, from any background, are valued, heard, and empowered to take responsibility within a collaborative setting.
* Continuous growth and learning: Opportunities to grow and develop on the job, through mentorship and structured training initiatives.
* Work-Life harmony: We understand the importance of balancing professional achievements with personal well-being.


Lysa is one of Sweden’s fastest growing FinTech companies - and the largest provider of digital discretionary portfolio management in the Nordics. Today Lysa has 185 000 paying customers and we manage about EUR 5bn. We have launched our platform in Denmark and Finland, and also in Germany. Our team of 75 has a mission-driven culture, a high employee Net Promoter Score (eNPS), and we work hard to have a significant impact on the European savings market. You will have the opportunity to participate in Lysa's long-term incentive program and thereby take part in Lysa's long-term growth.


We are a highly skilled and motivated team where earning trust and adding value is at the core of our collaborative culture.


Want to join us?


Apply now by clicking the link below. For any questions, feel free to reach out to Fredrik, VP of Engineering, fredrik.lindstrom@lysa.se.


We're excited to welcome you to our team of brilliant stars.

title: Är du Ictechs nästa Business Developer?
description:
**Brinner du för mötet mellan människor och teknik och får energi av att skapa affärer som gör verklig skillnad? Vi söker en säljare till Göteborg som vill kombinera sin sociala och affärsmässiga förmåga med ett genuint intresse för IT och mjukvaruutveckling.**

**Om Ictech**
-------------


Ictech är ett teknik- och konsultbolag inom system- och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi driver och medverkar i forskningsprojekt och ligger långt i teknikens framkant och våra kunder hyllar oss för vår tekniska höjd, transparens och pragmatiska inställning till problemlösning. Nu befinner vi oss i en spännande tillväxtfas och stärker teamet med en säljare som kan ta ett helhetsgrepp om vår proaktiva försäljning. Rollen är placerad i Göteborg men du kommer även att samarbeta med våra kontor i Linköping, Stockholm, Jönköping, Västerås & Karlstad.  

  

  



**Om rollen**
-------------


Som Business Developer hos oss får du en central roll i att skapa och utveckla kundrelationer. Du ansvarar för hela försäljningsprocessen – från första kontakt till signerad affär – och arbetar nära konsultchefer, rekryterare och projektledare för att hitta rätt lösningar. Rollen har ett tydligt fokus på projekt- och lösningsförsäljning där du driver affärer som bygger långsiktigt värde.


Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter blir att:

* Identifiera och bearbeta nya affärsmöjligheter
* Matcha kundernas behov med rätt kompetens och lösningar
* Driva och ansvara för hela säljprocessen
* Arbeta med projektförsäljning och lösningsorienterad försäljning
* Bygga och vårda långsiktiga kundrelationer

**Vem är du?**
--------------


Vi söker dig som trivs i en miljö där affär, relation och teknik möts. Du har ett starkt driv och motiveras av att nå resultat, men ser också värdet i att bygga långsiktiga samarbeten.


Vi tror att du har:

* Erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning, gärna inom IT, teknik eller konsultbranschen
* Intresse och förståelse för IT och mjukvaruutveckling
* Erfarenhet av projekt- och lösningsförsäljning
* Förmåga att bygga förtroendefulla relationer och driva affärer till avslut
* Affärsmässighet och skicklighet i förhandlingar

**Vad erbjuder vi?**
--------------------


Hos Ictech får du stor frihet att planera ditt arbete och möjlighet att bli en av våra nyckelpersoner i Göteborg. Du kliver in i en kultur med hög teknisk kompetens, stark lagkänsla och korta beslutsvägar, där vi stöttar varandra och har roligt även när uppdragen är utmanande. Här kan du växa tillsammans med ett bolag i utveckling och påverka både affär, erbjudande och arbetssätt.

**Ansökan**
-----------


Vi välkomnar ansökningar från alla! Till den här rollen är din personlighet minst lika viktig som din erfarenhet inom försäljning. Har du frågor är du varmt välkommen att kontakta andreas.lindblom@ictech.se. Urval sker löpande – skicka gärna din ansökan så snart som möjligt.

title: Webbutvecklare (React/TypeScript)
description:
Vi söker en webbutvecklare med stark kompetens i React och TypeScript. Du bygger och vidareutvecklar användarvänliga, snabba och tillgängliga gränssnitt i en modern frontend-miljö och samarbetar nära med design, produkt och backend.

**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har djup erfarenhet av React + TypeScript (hooks, context, komponentmönster).
* Är van vid state-hantering (t.ex. React Query/Zustand/Redux Toolkit) och formulär (React Hook Form).
* Kan prestandaoptimera och följa Core Web Vitals; arbetar med koddelning och lazy loading.
* Behärskar testning (Jest, React Testing Library/Playwright) och tillgänglighet enligt WCAG.
* Är trygg med moderna byggverktyg (Vite/Webpack), CI/CD och versionshantering (Git).
* Samarbetar väl med designers (Figma/Storybook) och är social/kommunikativ i team.

**Meriterande:**


Next.js (SSR/SSG), Tailwind CSS/Design System, GraphQL/REST, Node.js för enklare backend, E2E-test (Playwright/Cypress), observability (Sentry), internationellisering (i18n).

title: Backendutvecklare (Rust)
description:
Vi söker en senior backendutvecklare med stark Rust-kompetens som trivs i samarbete med produkt, UX och andra utvecklare. Du bygger skalbara tjänster och API:er i en modern molnmiljö, med fokus på prestanda, säkerhet och robust testning.

**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har gedigen erfarenhet av backendutveckling och Rust i produktion (t.ex. async m. Tokio/Axum/Actix).
* Kan designa och implementera skalbara API:er (REST/gRPC) och eventdrivna tjänster.
* Behärskar databaser (gärna PostgreSQL) och cache/meddelandeköer (Redis/Kafka el. liknande).
* Är van vid Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD och moln (AWS/Azure/GCP).
* Skriver testbar och säker kod samt är bekväm med kodgranskningar.
* Är social, kommunikativ och trivs i nära samarbete med intressenter.

**Meriterande**: Erfarenhet av Go/TypeScript, observability (OpenTelemetry/Grafana/Prometheus), IaC (Terraform), samt performance-profilering i Rust.

title: Fullstack-utvecklare / Technical Co-Founder – Fotbollsstartup i Malmö (Equity-baserat)
description:
Om Prosper


Prosper är en ny fotbollstartup i Malmö som bygger ett Player Potential-system i app och webb – där AI och fotboll möts för att hjälpa klubbar, spelare och scouter att utveckla potential på helt nya sätt. Grunden är forskning och erfarenhet från elitnivå, och vår ambition är att skapa en internationell plattform för talangutveckling.


Vi som driver projektet


Bakom Prosper står jag, med 20 års erfarenhet av att bygga startups, tillsammans med en mycket senior internationell scout och expert på talangutveckling. Vi kombinerar entreprenörskap, fotbollskunskap och starka nätverk – och har redan samarbete på plats med en av Skandinaviens största klubbar.


Din roll


Vi söker en technical co-founder – en fullstack-utvecklare i Malmöregionen som vill vara med från början och bygga produkten tillsammans med oss. Du kommer att ansvara för utvecklingen av vår MVP:

* Bygga både webb och app (gärna med moderna ramverk som React/React Native/Node.js eller motsvarande).
* Delta i produktdesign, databas och AI-komponenter.
* Vara en del av grundarteamet och forma både produkt och bolag.


Viktigt att veta

* Rollen är equity-baserad i detta tidiga skede.
* När vi har en fungerande MVP är planen att säkra finansiering via kassaflöde eller riskkapital.
* Du blir medgrundare, inte anställd – och får möjlighet att bygga ägande i bolaget från dag ett.
* Initialt på deltid, vilket går att kombinera med heltidsarbete på annat bolag.


Vem du är

* Du älskar både fotboll och tech.
* Du trivs med att bygga från grunden och ta ansvar.
* Du lockas av att bli co-founder i en startup snarare än att vara anställd.
* Du finns i Malmöregionen och vill arbeta nära oss på plats.

title: SW Developer/Technician for Orbit - Tietoevry Care (m/f/d)
description:
Job Description **At Tietoevry Care you’ll get a chance to provide patients and end users with product offerings that help them in their life, reinventing the world for good. If that sounds interesting, please keep on reading.**

 **About us**


Tietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.

  

We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors from intensive care to laboratory and social care. In addition to working closely with our customers, we also have our own products that we build and develop for various fields in society. From enabling healthcare professionals to spend more valuable time with their patients to providing data for professional athletes to achieve even better results, we make all that possible. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and wellbeing of people in need.

 **About the role**


Within product development business, we develop a range of products that support the healthcare sector. Our team consists of professionals in software development, technicians, testers and support.


We are now looking for senior technicians with development experience to focus on the Nordic region's leading operations planning system Orbit.

 **In this role you will**

* Be able to lead other, more junior colleagues
* Be able to lead the change process forward
* Be a role model as a Technician/Developer
* Be a trusted advisor and communicate technical language to non-technical customers

 **We are looking for someone with**

* At least 5 years’ experience of complex environment
* Great drive of implementing good value for the customer
* Expertise in; Win Server, SQL, Firewalls/Ip, PowerShell, Redundant environments, Load balancing
* Fluency in Swedish is mandatory, both in written and oral

**Desirable:**  

 Work with Win-services, CreateMSI-pkt, Certificate handling, Azure

  

**Good to have:**

* Docker / Kubernetes, Consul, Elasticsearch, RabbitMq, Seq, Prometheus
* DevOps experience

 **It would be beneficial if you also**

* Have experience of the healthcare sector

 **What’s in it for you?**


With us you will be part of the important and meaningful work of developing healthcare for all of us. You have an important mission to make a difference that really matters. In addition, as a company we offer you professional growth, open and friendly culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working.

  

Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle. We want to encourage you to keep up that curiosity and deepen your knowledge on topics you’re interested in. For example, we host a ‘Keep Learning Week’ twice a year, a week where everyone at Tietoevry has the possibility to join different training courses in a truly global setting.

 **Could you be our new colleague?**


We look forward to hearing from you! We will fill the position as soon as we find the right person, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact the hiring manager annika.nivestam@tietoevry.com

  

*We perform background checks on all final candidates.*

*Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies.*

 **About Tietoevry**


Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.


Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.

  

#LI-Hybrid

  

Additional Information  

At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.


Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)
company_description: Join our team to create purposeful technology that reinvents the world. For good.

title: SW Developer for Orbit - Tietoevry Care (m/f/d)
description:
Job Description **At Tietoevry Care you’ll get a chance to provide patients and end users with product offerings that help them in their life, reinventing the world for good. If that sounds interesting, please keep on reading.**

 **About us**


Tietoevry Care is modernizing the Nordic health and social care sector with modular, open, and interoperable software. We develop and deliver high quality software solutions and services that enable healthcare and welfare professionals to do their work even better and with higher efficiency - have more time to care.

  

We are a global team of professionals working on providing products and services to different sectors from intensive care to laboratory and social care. In addition to working closely with our customers, we also have our own products that we build and develop for various fields in society. From enabling healthcare professionals to spend more valuable time with their patients to providing data for professional athletes to achieve even better results, we make all that possible. With us you can build technology for the good of society and make your mark on the health and wellbeing of people in need.

 **About the role**


Within product development business, we develop a range of products that support the healthcare sector. Our team consists of professionals in software development, testers and support.


We are now looking for senior developers to focus on the Nordic region's leading operations planning system Orbit.

 **In this role you will**

* Be able to lead other, more junior developers
* Be able to lead the change process forward
* Be a role model as a developer
* Be a trusted advisor and communicate technical language to non-technical customers

 **We are looking for someone with**

* At least 5 years’ experience in complex development
* Great drive of implementing good value for the customer
* Expertise in some languages and framework, but also familiar with others, for example C#, .Net Framework, .Net Core and SQL
* Desirable: Application Security, MVVM, Elasticsearch, NetMQ, RabbitMQ and DevExpress
* DevOps experience
* Fluency in Swedish is mandatory, both in written and oral

 **It would be beneficial if you also**

* Have experience in the healthcare sector

 **What’s in it for you?**


With us you will be part of the important and meaningful work of developing healthcare for all of us. You have an important mission to make a difference that really matters. In addition, as a company we offer you professional growth, open and friendly culture, and an outstanding work-life balance! We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful. We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working.

  

Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle. We want to encourage you to keep up that curiosity and deepen your knowledge on topics you’re interested in. For example, we host a ‘Keep Learning Week’ twice a year, a week where everyone at Tietoevry has the possibility to join different training courses in a truly global setting.

 **Could you be our new colleague?**


We look forward to hearing from you! We will fill the position as soon as we find the right person, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact the hiring manager annika.nivestam@tietoevry.com

  

*We perform background checks on all final candidates.*

*Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies.*

 **About Tietoevry**


Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.


Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs.

  

#LI-Hybrid

  

Additional Information  

At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.


Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Senior Software developer - Tietoevry Industry (m/f/d)
description:
Job Description **Senior Software Developer - Tietoevry Industry** **(m/f/d)**


Är du en nyfiken och engagerad mjukvaruutvecklare och vill ansluta dig till ett av Nordens största techföretag? Då är det här rollen för dig!

  

Vi söker en Senior Software Developer som vill bli en del av Tietoevry Industry. Tietoevry Industry är en innovativ frontrunner specialiserad på segmentspecifik mjukvara och dataplattformstjänster. Vår mjukvara är designad i nära samarbete med våra kunder och baserad på vår omfattande branschkunskap och djupa expertis

 **När du börjar på Tietoevry Industry som Senior Software Developer**

* Du ingår i ett skickligt team av utvecklare och lösningsarkitekter där du lär dig nya saker tillsammans med dina kollegor
* Du kommer att utveckla fantastiska mjukvaruprodukter med ett helhetsansvar med hjälp av agila metoder

 **Vem vi letar efter**

* Du har en universitetsexamen inom ett relevant område, kombinerat med flera års arbetslivserfarenhet och bakgrund inom agil mjukvaruutveckling, verktyg och driftsättning. Eller andra relevanta erfarenheter
* Du har erfarenhet av att utveckla i .NET-miljöer
* Du har erfarenhet av att utveckla med Entity Framework
* Du har erfarenhet av att utveckla med SQL Server-databaser
* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med GitHub och förståelse för CI/CD pipelines.
* Flytande språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift

  

Som person tror vi att du är en lagspelare som tar handling och visar ansvar för att organisera ditt arbete och lösa dina uppgifter. Med vår agila end-to-end utvecklingsprocess kommer du att fortsätta att både lära av och coacha dina kollegor, så kommunikation är viktigt för oss. Tekniken utvecklas snabbt, så att lära dig nya banbrytande tekniker är något du strävar efter att göra.

 **Det vi också tror att du har**

* Har erfarenhet av MVC
* Har erfarenhet av OIDC
* Har erfarenhet av Angular/Vue/React eller liknande

 **Vi erbjuder**


Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en växande och snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och lärande som en livsstil där du behöver avlära och lära dig om varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.

 **Fick vi dig inspirerad?**


Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!


Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta rekryterande chef Mikael Rosling, mikael.rosling@tietoevry.com

  

Hoppas vi hörs snart!


Plats: Uppsala

 *Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*

*Tietoevry tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*

*Tietoevry trivs med mångfald och vi välkomnar sökande av alla kön, åldrar, förmågor, etniciteter, inriktningar, övertygelser och bakgrunder.*

 **Om Tietoevry**


Tietoevry skapar målmedveten teknik som återuppfinner världen för gott. Vi är ett ledande teknikföretag med ett starkt nordiskt arv och global kapacitet. Baserat på våra kärnvärden öppenhet, tillit och mångfald, arbetar vi med våra kunder för att utveckla digitala framtider där företag, samhällen och mänskligheten frodas.

  

Våra 24 000 experter globalt specialiserade på moln, data och mjukvara och betjänar tusentals företagskunder och offentliga kunder i mer än 90 länder. Tietoevrys årliga omsättning är cirka 3 miljarder euro och bolagets aktier är noterade på NASDAQ-börsen i Helsingfors och Stockholm samt på Oslo Børs.

  

Skapar målmedveten teknik för att återuppfinna världen för gott

  

Additional Information  

At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.


Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Vi söker Ruby on Rails-utvecklare
description:
Vi söker en passionerad och skicklig Ruby on Rails-utvecklare som vill vara med och bygga framtidens digitala lösningar. Du kommer att arbeta i ett tvärfunktionellt team med fokus på att utveckla skalbara och användarvänliga webbtjänster.


**Placeringsort:** Stockholm  

**Omfattning:** Heltid  

**Start:** Enligt överenskommelse

### **Vad du kommer att göra**

* Utveckla och underhålla applikationer i Ruby on Rails
* Delta i hela utvecklingscykeln – från idé till produktion
* Samarbeta med produktägare, designers och andra utvecklare
* Säkerställa kodkvalitet genom testning och kodgranskning
* Bidra till tekniska beslut och arkitektur

### **Vi tror att du har**

* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av Ruby on Rails
* God förståelse för HTML, CSS, JavaScript och moderna frontend-ramverk
* Erfarenhet av PostgreSQL eller andra relationsdatabaser
* Vana att arbeta med Git och CI/CD
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift

### **Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av Docker, Kubernetes eller molntjänster (AWS, Azure)
* Bidrag till open source-projekt
* Intresse för UX och tillgänglighet

### **Vi erbjuder**

* Kompetensutveckling och interna utbildningar
* Ett engagerat team med högt i tak
* Möjlighet att påverka både teknikval och produktstrategi

Nexer Maverick skapar digitala lösningar utifrån kundens olika behov, vilket innebär att uppdragen du får kommer att variera i karaktär. Det ger dig möjlighet att växa inom ditt område och lära dig nya saker. Gemensamt för alla våra projekt är att de är långsiktiga, kvalificerade och utmanande – och du kommer garanterat att ha roligt på jobbet!


En framgångsfaktor är att känna tillhörighet på jobbet. Du kommer att bli en del av vårt team, **CU-Development**, som består av ett tiotal utvecklare med olika bakgrund och erfarenhet. Vi satsar på sociala aktiviteter och ett högt välmående i teamet. Nexers ledord är *Passion & Execution*, vilket innebär att vi även fokuserar på kompetensutveckling.


**Ansökan**  

Skicka din ansökan och CV senast den **30 september 2025**.  

Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta Joakim Hampus på joakim.hampus@nexergroup.com

### **Om Nexer Maverick**


Maverick är Nexers digitala fullservicebyrå med cirka 90 specialister inom förändringsledning, design, innehållsproduktion, kommunikation, digital marknadsföring, UX och webbutveckling. Vi tog nyligen silver i Årets Byrå 2022, i klassen Digital 50+ MKR. På vår kundlista hittar du bland andra **Absolent Group**, **AstraZeneca**, **Chalmers Tekniska Högskola**, **Myndigheten för psykologiskt försvar**, **Volvo Cars** och **Volvo AB**.


Vi ser varje ny idé, innovation och möte som ett löfte om en bättre framtid – för dig, våra kunder och vår omvärld. Här får du drömma stort, tänka innovativt och vara med och skapa den optimala digitala upplevelsen för våra kunder. Med Nexer får du en driven arbetsgivare med internationell närvaro och alla möjligheter att utvecklas, engagera dig och vara med och påverka.

### **Våra kontor**


Nexer Maverick har kontor i **Stockholm**, **Göteborg**, **Malmö** och **Karlstad**, samt satelliter i **Bangalore, Indien**, och **Medellín, Colombia**.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom styrsystem till Electrification
description:
*Komatsu Forest strävar efter att bidra till framtidens hållbara skogsbruk, genom innovation och ny teknik. Nu leder vi nästa stora satsning för att bygga produkter med fokus på hållbarhet & hög kvalité som kan bidra till att skapa en framtid där människor, företag & vår planet kan växa tillsammans.*  

  

*Vi söker en mjukvaruutvecklare med kännedom och intresse av att utveckla styrsystem.*

**Vad kommer du att göra?**  

Som mjukvaruutvecklare hos oss kommer du att arbeta utveckling och systemdesign av vårt styrsystem. Du arbetar med allt från våra inbyggda system till, drift- och produktions uppföljning. I din roll bidrar du med övergripande design och arkitektur, samt testning och säkerställande av funktionell säkerhet av produkten. En viktig del är koordinering med andra avdelningar för att vi tillsammans ska nå målet att tillhandahålla den senaste och bästa tekniken för våra produkter.


Till din hjälp har du en ledare som ser dig, kollegor som stöttar dig och möjlighet att påverka din egen roll och utveckling. Utöver det erbjuder vi ett omväxlande arbete, möjlighet till personlig utveckling samt work/life balance.  

  

Tjänsten är placerad i Umeå.
  

  

**Vem är du?**  

För att lyckas i rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare hos oss har du en akademisk utbildning inom IT, samt några års erfarenhet av liknande roll. Du är van vid agilt arbetssätt och bekant med språk som C++, Mathworks och erfarenhet från utveckling av styrsystem, samt kännedom om kodarkitektur och enhetstestning. Har du erfarenhet av modelbaserad utveckling är det meriterande. Som person är du engagerad och vill arbeta i en miljö med stark känsla för kvalité och nytänkande. Du är kommunikativ, analytisk och nyfiken. Du tar ansvar för ditt arbete och bidrar till att skapa god dynamik i teamet.


Då stor del av vårt arbete innefattar både nationella och internationella kontaktytor kommunicerar du obehindrat på engelska, såväl i tal som skrift.  

  

**Vad erbjuder vi?**  

Som medarbetare på Komatsu Forest är du del av något större. Du blir en del av de stora innovationer och framsteg som hjälper till att forma skogsmaskinsbranschen. Just nu är vi på en spännande resa kring elektrifiering av våra maskiner.


Genom vår globala organisation får du stora möjligheter att utveckla dig och din karriär samtidigt som du tillsammans med dina kollegor är med och bidrar till en värld som är hållbar, inkluderande och tar socialt ansvar.


Vi är ett globalt företag som vet att mångfald bidrar till goda resultat och en bättre arbetsplats.

  

Välkommen med din ansökan!

  

Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vårt rekryteringsverktyg för att effektivisera och kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsarbetet. Alla dina uppgifter sparas i din profil och du kan enkelt logga in och uppdatera dina uppgifter när du vill. Fyll därför i dina uppgifter så omsorgsfullt som möjligt för att ge en rättvisande bild av dig själv. Uppgifterna behandlas och sparas enligt GDPR.

title: Developer - Backend
description:
Lysa’s vision is to set a new standard in savings through automation, efficiency and an unwavering dedication to our customers' best interests. We believe that many institutions work against their customers and we see a significant opportunity to establish a new financial champion. We are on a mission to make it simpler for people to save smarter. To achieve this, we need to continuously develop our product and expand into new markets. We have an outstanding team, but to further accelerate growth, we need more talented colleagues. We are currently seeking a Developer - Backend to join our team.

##### **The opportunity**


From concept to deployment, you'll have a direct hand in creating features for our customers and colleagues. Collaborating closely with product managers, designers, legal experts, and customer service, you'll see your ideas come to life and make a real difference.


You thrive on turning ideas into user-loved features and likely have the following background:

* A solid foundation in software development, with experience in Java or similar languages
* Experience of microservices
* Experience of applications running on cloud platforms such as AWS and distributed systems
* 

Technologies that we love at Lysa:

* Java
* Spring-boot
* Spring-cloud
* PostgreSQL
* Redis
* 

We are continuously updating to the latest versions to stay at the forefront of technology.


As a colleague, we believe you share Lysa’s values: Earn trust, Add value, Have grit. You enjoy working in a cross-functional environment and strive to build efficient collaborations across the organisation.

##### **What we offer**


Lysa offers a unique opportunity to work at the forefront of the financial industry by creating a better way to save and invest.


At Lysa, we cherish:

* A supportive Team environment: Where team members, from any background, are valued, heard, and empowered to take responsibility within a collaborative setting.
* Continuous growth and learning: Opportunities to grow and develop on the job, through mentorship and structured training initiatives.
* Work-Life harmony: We understand the importance of balancing professional achievements with personal well-being.


Lysa is one of Sweden’s fastest growing FinTech companies - and the largest provider of digital discretionary portfolio management in the Nordics. Today Lysa has 185 000 paying customers and we manage about EUR 5bn. We have launched our platform in Denmark and Finland, and also in Germany. Our team of 75 has a mission-driven culture, a high employee Net Promoter Score (eNPS), and we work hard to have a significant impact on the European savings market. You will have the opportunity to participate in Lysa's long-term incentive program and thereby take part in Lysa's long-term growth.


We are a highly skilled and motivated team where earning trust and adding value is at the core of our collaborative culture.


Want to join us?


Apply now by clicking the link below. For any questions, feel free to reach out to Fredrik, VP of Engineering, fredrik.lindstrom@lysa.se.


We're excited to welcome you to our team of brilliant stars.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Equimundus - The Equestrian Eco-System
 




  






 Role Description
 





 We are looking for developers as co-owners for a start-up with more than great potential to become something really valuable with the right people in the team.
 




  






 We are looking for several developer roles but with the same core requirements.
 



* 1 Lead developer - Very senior and used to manage very complex development projects
* 1-2 developers - Need to be eager to learn new things in a new business, focused either on full-stack development or either back-end or front-end(UI) development.



  






 You need experience in complex developments and very large environments with high loads and throughput including payment solutions, marketplaces, social media, cloud ERP solutions, framework construction and object-oriented development. On top of this you need to have solid skills in advanced security and authorizations in web development.
 





 It is also a big advantage if you have experience from app-development.
 




  






 Qualifications
 



* Advanced PHP 8.x
* Advanced MySQL database design and construction
* Containerizing solutions
* Building for load-balancing environments
* Developing module-based solutions
* Integrations
* Testing of web solutions including penetration testing
* HTML 5 and above
* Bootstrap
* Advanced Javascript
* Advanced JQuery
* Advanced CSS
* User interface design and implementation
* Ability to work independently and remotely
* Effective communication and collaboration skills
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is advantageous



  






 To be able to fit into the team you need to be able to put time and effort into the project as we are working on a quite agresive timeline.
 




  





  






 Please Note!
 





 We do not sponsor any work-visas and are only looking for people within the european union.
 




  






 Please also Note!
 





 This is a start-up and we are looking for co-owners to be a part of the founding team which means that we are not interested in buying development services.
 




  






 Do you feel for a big challenge and the possibility to be part of an interesting journey forward on and at the same time you also see that you are meeting the criterias above?
 




  






 Please contact us with an updated CV to applications@equimundus.com as a first step.

title: Frontend Developer with focus on UX/UI
description:
At Evolution AB / Nolimit City, we're building cutting-edge gaming products that redefine how players experience online entertainment. As we continue to grow, we're looking for a Frontend Developer with a strong UX/UI focus, or a UX/UI Designer with frontend development chops, to join one of our expanding engineering teams.
 



  





 You'll play a key role in shaping the look, feel, and interactivity of products that reach a global audience—contributing not only to how things work but also how they feel. At Evolution, design and development are not siloed; you'll be an essential part of product decisions from day one, working in highly collaborative, autonomous teams.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 



* Design and build intuitive, responsive, and beautiful interfaces with React (Next.js) and TypeScript.
* Bring UX and UI designs to life—from wireframes to pixel-perfect implementation.
* Collaborate closely with product owners and engineers to craft seamless user experiences.
* Own the frontend from concept to production, including performance optimization, accessibility, and maintainability.
* Contribute to our design system and help shape a consistent visual language across products.
* Continuously experiment, iterate, and improve based on real user feedback and data.
* Be part of a team that values learning through iteration, experimentation, and shared responsibility.



  





**You Might Be a Great Fit If You** 



* Have solid experience with React, TypeScript, and modern CSS techniques.
* Possess a keen eye for design details, and care deeply about creating delightful user experiences.
* Enjoy bridging the gap between design and development.
* Are comfortable building advanced components.
* Believe in clean, maintainable code and smooth user flows.
* Have good communication skills in English and love working in a collaborative environment.



  





**Bonus Points** 



* Experience with Next.js, Redux Toolkit, or Headless CMSs like Strapi.
* Understanding of accessibility and web performance best practices.
* Familiarity with UI/UX testing tools or user research methods.
* An interest in gaming or digital entertainment interfaces.



  





**Technologies You'll Touch** 



* React / Next.js
* TypeScript / JavaScript
* Redux Toolkit
* CSS / Tailwind CSS
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Git (GitHub Actions)



  





**Who we are** 




 We care more about your potential than checking every box. If you're excited about building exceptional interfaces and love working in small, empowered teams, we want to hear from you.
 



  





 Join one of Sweden's fastest-growing tech companies and help us craft experiences that players around the world love.
 



  





 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
 



  





 Apply on LinkedIn, or send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
 



  





 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Backend Developer Intern  [Remote]
company_industry: Software Development, IT System Custom Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**About XR Solutions** 




 XR Solutions is a technology-driven company pioneering
 **machine learning-powered augmented reality solutions** 
 for industrial clients.
 



 Our mission is to revolutionize how machines are operated, maintained, and optimized — enabling workflows and innovations that were once impossible. We combine research-based optimizations with cutting-edge AR technology to create
 **practical, reliable, and high-performance solutions** 
 that reshape industries.
 



 This internship offers a rare opportunity to
 **build backend systems that directly power advanced AR applications** 
 used in real-world industrial environments.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We’re looking for a
 **passionate, detail-oriented Backend Developer Intern** 
 with a strong interest in
 **API development, system integration, and backend architecture** 
 .
 



 This is a
 **remote, hands-on role** 
 where you will work closely with experienced developers to design, implement, and maintain backend services that support our AR platforms.
 



 While this is initially
 **unpaid** 
 , exceptional performance may lead to a
 **paid position** 
 after the internship.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 



* **Develop APIs** 
 : Build and maintain high-performance REST APIs using
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Express.js** 
 .
* **Database Management** 
 : Work with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 and ORM tools (Sequelize) to design and optimize database schemas.
* **System Integrations** 
 : Assist in integrating backend services with AR platforms and machine learning pipelines.
* **Testing & Quality Assurance** 
 : Write and run
 **unit and integration tests** 
 to ensure stability and performance.
* **DevOps Support** 
 : Learn to work with
 **AWS cloud infrastructure** 
 and contribute to maintaining scalable, secure environments.
* **Troubleshooting & Maintenance** 
 : Help debug, patch, and optimize backend systems to improve reliability.
* **Code Reviews** 
 : Participate in peer reviews to maintain code quality and follow industry best practices.



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Proficiency in
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Express.js**
* Solid
 **JavaScript** 
 &
 **TypeScript** 
 skills
* Experience with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 (basic to intermediate)
* Familiarity with
 **AWS services** 
 (some training provided)
* Understanding of
 **Git** 
 (we use Bitbucket)
* Basic knowledge of
 **CI/CD pipelines**
* Awareness of
 **IT security fundamentals**
* (Bonus) Experience with
 **Sequelize ORM**



  





**What You’ll Gain:** 



* Hands-on experience building backend systems for
 **real-world AR applications**
* Exposure to
 **AWS-based scalable architectures**
* Experience with
 **industrial-grade API design, testing, and security**
* Involvement in a
 **live product launch**



  





 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in backend development.

title: Software Developer
description:
*Studies show that women and underrepresented groups often hesitate to apply unless they meet every requirement. At Stegra, we’re building an impact-driven, sustainable company - and we need a diverse, inclusive team to make it happen.*
*If you share our passion but don’t meet every qualification, we encourage you to apply anyway. You might be the perfect fit for this role, or another as we grow.*
 At Stegra, we’re not just building a plant, we’re proving that sustainable industry is possible. And to do that, we need people like you.
   

  

 Join a team where safety comes first. Where we support each other, learn as we go, and make space for everyone to grow and contribute. This is your chance to be part of something big - while being closer to nature and leading a balanced, purposeful life.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 Right now, we are looking for a Software Developer for our Digital Domain, supporting the Finance and HR teams. In this role, you will report to the Digital Domain Manager and be part of a cross-functional digital team that ensures our Finance and HR functions have the modern digital capabilities they need to power a cutting-edge steel plant. The team is responsible for enabling Finance and HR to make timely, data-driven decisions by building and maintaining reliable backend services, APIs, and solution architectures.
   

  

 In this role will play a key role in shaping the digital backbone of our finance and HR functions. You will work closely with developers and business teams to build decoupled, flexible microservices that ensure accurate, well-structured data flows across Stegra, from manufacturing to sales and maintenance. You’ll be responsible for designing and operating the services your team provides, while also contributing to the long-term evolution of our digital infrastructure. Ultimately, this role ensures that finance and HR can depend on correct, well-structured, and well-governed data as the foundation for decision-making.
   

  

 Specific to this role, the day-to-day tasks will include the following but as we are a growing company with very little silos between teams, other tasks might be included as well.
   

  

* Design, develop, and operate backend services that are central to Stegra’s success, ensuring they are fast, scalable, and reliable.
* Build and maintain infrastructure, tools, and deployment pipelines that enable efficient development and high-quality delivery.
* Take ownership of the digital capabilities your team provides, from design to operation with a strong focus on reliability and continuous improvement.
* Shape solution architecture and design APIs and data flows that ensure P&O and finance have accurate, well-structured information from across the organization.
* Drive innovation and collaboration by working closely with other development and product teams to enhance our services and deliver real business value.


**What You’ll Bring**
 You bring energy, curiosity, and a thoughtful approach to your work. You care about building things that last, and you enjoy collaborating with others to find practical solutions. You thrive in agile environments and are always open to learning and trying new things both in technology and in how we work together.
   

  

 Specific to this role, we would like to see that you can tick off a fair amount of the boxes below
   

  

* A degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or equivalent practical experience.
* Some years of experience in backend development and microservive design.
* Experience building backend services using Kotlin, Java or similar.
* Awareness of best practices such as automated testing and continuous delivery
* Exposure to tools like Kubernetes, Terraform, and event-driven architectures, though a willingness to learn is just as important.
* Experience designing APIs and working with microservices architectures
* A collaborative mindset and the ability to communicate across teams and domains


**Benefits At Stegra**
 At Stegra, you’ll join a company where your work has real impact on the climate, the industry, and future generations. We’re building a culture rooted in safety, trust, and inclusion, where people feel supported to grow and thrive.
   

  

**Read More About Benefits At Stegra Here.**
**This is Stegra**
 Stegra is on a mission to change the global steel industry by producing green hydrogen, iron, and steel - with the goal of eliminating CO₂ emissions. Instead of coal, we use green hydrogen and fossil-free electricity, meaning our primary emissions will be water and heat.
   

  

 By 2030, our ambition is to produce 5 million tonnes of green steel annually in our fully integrated, digitized, and sustainable plant in Boden, Northern Sweden - currently under construction. But this is just the beginning. Our expertise in green hydrogen will enable us to decarbonize industries beyond steel, paving the way for a cleaner future.
   

  

**Our Stockholm Office**
 Our modern Stockholm office is located on Norra Stationsgatan, close to Karolinska University Hospital in central Stockholm. Here, you’ll find a bright, collaborative workspace where cross-functional teams connect, share ideas, and drive progress. Whether you're visiting regularly or working hybrid, you'll be part of a vibrant office culture with easy access to the city’s energy and amenities.
   

  

*Founded in 2020, Stegra (formerly H2 Green Steel) was created with the purpose to decarbonize hard-to-abate industry. Construction of our first project – an integrated plant producing green hydrogen, green iron and green steel – is well underway in Boden, Sweden. Slashing emissions using green hydrogen and renewable electricity, we’re starting a clean industrial revolution. Steel is just the beginning.
   

  

 We are building a diverse and rapidly growing team spread across our site and offices in Boden and Stockholm, targeting close to 1500 employees by the end of 2025. Together, we focus on delivering green impact – for our people, customers, investors, society and planet.*

title: Software Developer
description:

title: Software Engineer
description:
Europe (On-site, 5 days/week)
   

  

 High-growth Startup | Direct Hire

 that is expanding its engineering team in Europe. They are looking for

 This is a chance to join a

title: Full Stack Web Developer
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**We’re looking for an accomplished developer with experience in all aspects of building web applications to help us create the best video commerce platform on the market.** 




  





  





 The Bambuser Research & Development department builds the world’s best video-based shopping solutions, using our pioneering in-house live video platform continuously developed over the last 17 years. We have a long legacy of quality engineering in this space.
 



 As a Bambuser team member, you will have the opportunity to contribute at the forefront of the emerging market that is video commerce. You will have a chance to work both individually and in close collaboration with others on projects in the challenging environment of real-time live video applications. You will join a group of highly skilled engineers including top open source contributors and world-class experts in their respective fields.
 



 Our philosophy is to build robustly, scalably, and securely for the future, emphasizing quality and practicality, without over-engineering. We ship early and often, and learn from our experiences
 **.** 




  





**What you will do** 




 In the role of Full Stack Web Developer, you will develop, deploy, and maintain the frontend and backend of one or more of our web applications in use by millions of people worldwide. Opportunities to show off your skills will vary across projects, and may include for example: designing the high-performance caching strategies for high-volume APIs, building React applications from scratch, or optimizing GitLab CI/CD deployment pipelines.
 



  





**Who you are** 



* You have at least 5 years working as a Full Stack Developer, Software Engineer, or similar role.
* You have at least 3 years experience building, deploying, and maintaining both the frontend and backend of modern web applications.
* You have at least 2 years experience working extensively in JavaScript/TypeScript code bases.
* You have strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug complex issues effectively.
* You have a solid understanding of the uses and limitations of the standard building blocks of web services, e.g. REST, databases (relational and document), caches, message queues, serverless/server-based, transfer protocols, etc.
* You have a strongly rooted security mindset and the proclivity to build securely by default.
* You have experience collaborating with other developers in shared code bases, acting as a reviewer for others as well as having the ability to structure and explain your own code changes concisely.
* You have a proven ability to plan, execute, and complete development projects, both independently and in collaboration with others.
* You know when it's the right time to accept technical debt and when it's time to pay it off.



  





**Bonus if you have:** 



* Experience building B2B SaaS platforms
* Experience building enterprise services
* Experience working in start-up or scale-up businesses



  





**Toolkit** 



* Google Cloud Platform (Firebase, Firestore, AppEngine, Cloud Functions, PubSub, Memorystore, etc.)
* Amazon Web Services (EC2, CloudFront, S3, Lambda, RDS, Route53, Elastic Beanstalk, SQS, ElastiCache, etc.)
* MariaDB/MySQL, PostgreSQL, BigQuery
* JavaScript/TypeScript (Node.js, React, Webpack)
* HTTP Live Streaming (HLS), WebRTC, WebSocket
* Bash/Dash, Docker, Git, GitLab
* WooCommerce and Shopify for demosites
* Gemini CLI, OpenAI APIs, Lovable, Cursor



  





**Why Join Bambuser?** 




 We combine the impact and pace of a scale-up with the creativity of a startup. We’re not just another SaaS company. We’re building the future of video commerce. At Bambuser, you’ll have the freedom, trust, and firepower to move fast and build things that matter.
 



  





*This job ad was written by a human (alleged).*

title: Fullstack Engineer - Platform Developer Experience
description:
At Spotify, we are committed to empowering our teams by equipping them with groundbreaking tools that redefine productivity and efficiency. At the heart of this mission is the AiKA squad, pioneering the future of AI-powered knowledge assistance. The AiKA Backstage Plugin is revolutionizing how employees access and utilize internal knowledge, streamlining workflows, and unlocking new levels of innovation and collaboration across and beyond Spotify.
   

  

 Our squad plays a vital role in enabling R&D employees to work smarter and more effectively. We build scalable tools and systems that integrate Generative AI (GenAI) capabilities into internal processes, driving collaboration and innovation not only across Spotify but also for thousands of Backstage users worldwide. As AiKA evolves toward externalization, we are at the forefront of competing with the broader industry, fostering a dynamic, startup-like culture where innovation thrives. By joining us, you will have the unique opportunity to shape how employees worldwide interact with knowledge and tools, making their work more efficient, enjoyable, and future-focused.
   

  

 You will work with a collaborative and diverse team to build and maintain infrastructure, features, and tools that empower Spotify employees globally. Your expertise in fullstack development, Generative AI, and developer tools will be instrumental in delivering high-quality and impactful solutions.
   

  

 As with many innovative projects, your responsibilities will vary frequently. You'll work across different technologies, product domains, and teams. We seek someone passionate about thriving in this type of dynamic environment!
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Collaborate with a cross-functional team of engineers, product managers, and designers to solve exciting and impactful problems, delivering value to Spotify employees and external Backstage users
* Build and maintain the AiKA Backstage Plugin, internally and externally, — our flagship knowledge assistance tool — and explore ways to incorporate Generative AI (GenAI) into Backstage workflows
* Deliver testable, maintainable, and high-quality code, and take operational responsibility for the components that you develop
* Design and maintain fullstack systems, primarily using TypeScript, Node.js, and other modern web technologies
* Contribute to technical RFCs and documentation to align approaches across the team and broader organization
* Explore creative solutions to integrate AI/ML capabilities into Spotify's developer tools
* Mentor team members, share your knowledge, and promote best practices


 Who You Are
   

  

* You have professional experience working with modern web technologies such as TypeScript, and Node.js.
* You are passionate about delivering end-to-end experiences and care about software architecture across the frontend, backend, and the APIs that glue them together.
* You have practical knowledge or experience with Backstage and are enthusiastic about improving developer tooling.
* You have experience with or are eager to work with Python, particularly for AI/ML integrations.
* You are familiar with Generative AI concepts, and hands-on experience is a huge plus.
* You have excellent communication and collaboration skills and go above and beyond to ensure alignment across diverse teams.
* You value writing high-quality, testable code and are comfortable owning your work, from development to production.
* You are eager to learn, experiment, and thrive in a dynamic environment where priorities can shift.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based Stockholm
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Software Engineer, Automation
description:
**Full-time | Based in Sweden (Gothenburg or Stockholm)**
 We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Automation team within our Software department at Zacco. In this role, you'll build digital solutions that make our company more efficient, and free up time for our colleagues.
   

  

 With digitalization and AI reshaping intellectual property, we're aiming to become the leading digital-native intellectual property firm in Europe. We blend consulting, legal, and tech to help clients protect and grow their ideas, shaping the future of innovation.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Design, develop, ship and maintain our software automations
* Develop integrations with internal and external systems
* Embed AI in our automations
* Provide support and guidance on how to improve our Python code base
* Work with our internal experts in intellectual property


**Our Tech Stack**
* Automations are developed in Python with type checking
* IPview (our client portal) is developed in C#, TypeScript, React
* Hosted on Azure and on-premises in VMware
* GitHub
* Linear.app
* Windows or Mac (your choice)
* Most of us use VS Code or Neovim


**We Offer**
* Interesting and challenging work, using software to reshape intellectual property
* A company that values software engineering
* A forward-thinking and profitable firm with over 500 employees across 6 countries and a strong reputation in the industry
* A collaborative and inclusive team with a flat hierarchy and open culture
* Competitive compensation and benefits
* A hybrid work model requiring 2-3 days in the office per week (full remote possible for exceptional candidates)


**You Bring**
* Your experience as a software engineer responsible for designing, developing, shipping and maintaining software services
* Clear and confident communication in English, both written and verbal
* Excellent knowledge of:
* Python
* A statically typed programming language (such as C#, Java, C++, Rust, etc.)
* Databases (SQL)
* Comfortable with most of this:
* Version control and code reviews (Git, GitHub)
* Using and developing HTTP APIs
* Testing
* Docker
* CI/CD
* Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.)
* Web frontend (HTML, CSS, and perhaps frameworks such as React, Vue, Svelte, Solid, Lit, etc.)
* Secure coding (cryptography, OWASP, etc.)
* Algorithms and data structures
* System design
* Writing RFDs (Requests for Discussions)


**How We Think And Work**
* Drive — We are self-motivated, driving through challenges with minimal oversight.
* Passion — We are passionate about software engineering, continuously learning about new technologies and best practices.
* Excellence — We strive to deliver exceptional products, continuously improving our work with meticulous attention to detail.
* Results — We are doers who get things done and deliver tangible outcomes.
* Communication — We articulate thoughts clearly, ask insightful questions, and make complex ideas accessible.
* Problem-solving — We dissect complex problems and find elegant, simplified solutions.
* Ownership — We think on behalf of the entire company, looking beyond the scope of our own team.
* Boldness — We are not afraid to ask "why" and challenge the status quo.
* Team players — We thrive in a feedback-rich environment and iterate quickly based on new insights.


**Why Join Zacco**
 At Zacco, you’ll be part of a collaborative, international team that values trust, responsibility, and professional growth. Zacco offers a flexible working policy (minimum 3 days per week in the office) and a Scandinavian work culture characterized by flat structures, trust, and responsibility. With more than 500 employees and recognized expertise in all aspects of intellectual property law, Zacco provides an environment where you can learn from top professionals, grow your international network, and make a real impact.

title: Software Engineer - JavaScirpt - Mobile App
description:
Electronic Arts creates next-level entertainment experiences that inspire players and fans around the world. Here, everyone is part of the story. Part of a community that connects across the globe. A place where creativity thrives, new perspectives are invited, and ideas matter. A team where everyone makes play happen.
 



  





 EAX In-game Experiences team is responsible for EA Connect, our social overlay facilitating cross-platform party, voip, quick messaging and game invites, used in most EA Sports titles. We are also responsible for the new Spotify integration recently released in FC 25.
 



 We are looking for someone to help us build experiences like this, both on mobile devices and consoles/PCs, using JavaScript and React..
 



  





 You will be based in the Stockholm office in a hybrid work environment. You will report to an engineering lead in the team.
 











**Responsibilities** 
 :
 


* You will primarily be working with feature development in JavaScript, using TypeScript and React Native.

 :

* Experience with frontend development

* Experience using React Native
