   Who: Design students, recent graduates, early-career designers, or anyone with a strong design mindset eager to shape the next generation of products.
 



  





**Role – Industrial Design Intern** 




 You’ll contribute to the 
 **end-to-end design development** 
  of Arfve’s modular earbuds and charging ecosystem, including:
 


* Creating 
 **concept sketches and CAD models** 
  exploring product form, ergonomics, and modularity.
* Developing 
 **CMF (Color, Material, Finish) strategies** 
  that balance aesthetics, sustainability, and durability.
* Supporting the creation of 
 **exploded views and design mock-ups** 
  for campaign assets.
* Exploring 
 **ergonomic testing methods** 
  (digital fit models, 3D prints, or simulations).
* Collaborating with engineering and visual content teams to ensure design feasibility and brand consistency.
* Preparing design assets for crowdfunding campaign materials (renders, design storyboards, product presentations).



  





**Required & Advantageous Skills** 




**Required:** 



* CAD software (SolidWorks, Rhino, Fusion 360, Inventor or similar).
* Sketching/visualization skills.
* Understanding of ergonomics and product usability.
* Familiarity with sustainable design principles.



**Advantageous:** 



* Rendering/visualization tools (KeyShot, Blender, Cinema4D).
* Experience with CMF development.
* Knowledge of design for manufacturing and Assembly (DFM/DFA).
* Rapid prototyping (3D printing, foam models, mock-ups).



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* Work on 
 **real products** 
  shaping the future of audio tech.
* Build a portfolio of industrial design concepts seen in a global crowdfunding campaign.
* Bring storytelling and creativity into real projects launching globally
* Get structured guidance and feedback from design + engineering leads.
* Collaborate in a multidisciplinary design team shaping our next-generation products
* Push your creative boundaries ! your ideas and suggestions will always be heard, and if strong, integrated into the product.



  





**What We Value** 



* Curiosity and problem-solving mindset.
* Strong visual storytelling skills.
* Ability to balance creativity with practical constraints.
* Commitment and eagerness to learn quickly.



  





**How to Apply** 




 Apply directly through
 **LinkedIn’s Easy Apply** 
 , and also send an email to 
 **team@arfve.com** 
  with:
 


* A short note on what excites you about joining this internship.
* Your resume.
* Your portfolio (if available).



  Start: Immediate preferred
 



  Format: Remote and flexible working hours with weekly digital check-ins/meetings.
 



  





 Let’s design products that inspire, create icons that endure, and build the future of tech with Arfve.
 


* Apply today and join 
 **Arfve Accelerator 2025 – Industrial Design Team!**

title: Product Manager to team Seller Success
description:
**Help shape the product behind one of life’s biggest decisions (no pressure, right!?). Join our Seller Success team as our new Product Manager – the crew is on a mission to make selling your home feel a little less like a rollercoaster and a lot more like a guided tour. You’ll be working on a product that practically everyone in Sweden knows and loves. In fact, 9 out of 10 homes are sold on our platform. So yes, your work will directly influence the housing market – and possibly even dinner table conversations across the country.**
 ☝🏽 Please apply by September 25 at the latest.
   

  

 We’re at an exciting stage where we’re taking the next step in how we support our sellers. The basics are solid: strong brand recognition, impressive conversion rates, and a product people genuinely enjoy using (rare, we know!). But the best part? The potential ahead is even greater.
   

  

 As Product Manager, you’ll steer both strategy and execution: turning customer insights into brilliant new solutions, developing our offerings, and making sure every seller feels guided, confident, and supported throughout their journey. Along the way, you’ll collaborate with designers, engineers, and other bright minds to create experiences that delight our sellers, while also driving growth and value for the company.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Up To 🏡**
 As a Product Manager in the Seller Success team, you’ll set the direction and define the long-term vision for our product, making sure it aligns with Hemnet’s overall goals. You’ll work closely with colleagues in tech, UX, analytics and across the business to turn strategies into reality and deliver strong go-to-market plans.
   

  

 Your focus will always be on tuning in the customer: using insights and data to continuously refine and personalize the seller journey. Through discovery, testing and iteration, you’ll make sure every step of the flow adds value and feels effortless for our users.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll also be a catalyst for collaboration and growth. You’ll inspire your team to challenge assumptions, prioritize what matters most, and work seamlessly across departments. When faced with complexity or ambiguity, you’ll bring clarity through adaptive communication and decisive action. And, just as importantly, you’ll embrace feedback and use it to drive continuous improvement, for yourself, your team, and the way we build products at Hemnet.
   

  

**What You Bring 🌟**
 We strongly believe in action over perfection; and this way of working is part of your spine, the testing, the trying, sometimes failing but always learning. So with that said, you are curious, bold and challenge old truths and outdated ways of working.
   

  

 At the same time, you know that product management is never a solo mission. You thrive in collaboration, bringing people together around a common vision and making sure every voice is heard. For you, success is something we achieve as a team, whether that’s with engineers, designers, analysts, or stakeholders across the company.
   

  

 You combine strategic thinking with hands-on pragmatism, and you’re just as comfortable in the weeds of discovery and iteration as you are in setting a long-term product direction. You communicate clearly, adapt quickly, and inspire trust by balancing empathy with decisiveness. Above all, you care deeply about creating real value for users and know that the best products are built when we win together.
   

  

**Required Skills**
* Relevant experience in product management, business development or similar, preferably from tech scale-ups or mature companies with commercial product exposure
* Strong commercial product experience
* Proven expertise in creating product strategy and vision, and experience with Agile product development
* Strong background in product discovery and user research, with a data-driven approach to decision making
* Excellent stakeholder management skills and the ability to lead and inspire cross-functional teams
* Deep understanding of Agile or Lean practices, with hands-on experience driving iterative product development, continuous improvement, and fostering a culture of collaboration
* Fluency in Swedish and English


 Bonus
   

  

* Hands-on technical experience and familiarity with Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)


**Hello from** 
**Alicia** 
**,** 
**Johan** 
**and** 
**Yichu** 
**! 👋🏽**
 Hi and welcome to our team! With us, you’ll find a group of curious, dedicated, and humble colleagues who love collaborating and developing our products - whether we’re working on UX or development. We work closely together with great trust and high autonomy, which allows us to be both creative and efficient. At the same time, our goals are ambitious, and that makes working here a lot of fun!
   

  

 The best part of our everyday work? Taking on exciting challenges in a domain that is constantly evolving. We do it our way: with the freedom to test ideas, simple tools to capture insights from users, and clear goals that let us really see the impact of our work on the business.
   

  

 We hope you’ll bring the same dedication, a business-driven mindset, but also clarity and humility. Together, we’ll continue to create truly great products for all home sellers out there, giving them the best possible conditions to succeed with their sales.
   

  

 We look forward to building the sales journey with you - and having fun along the way!
   

  

**A Note on Inclusion** 
 💚
   

  

 At Hemnet, we believe that diversity in gender, sexual orientation, ability, neurodiversity, cultural background and life experience makes us stronger. We welcome applicants of all identities and backgrounds.
   

  

 If you meet many but not all of the requirements, we encourage you to apply. We value curiosity, a strong sense of purpose and the motivation to learn and grow, alongside your skills and experiences.

title: Internship (LIA): AI Bot Development & Customer Experience (Intercom)
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, Maritime, and Information Services
description:
**About Airmee**
 Airmee is a tech-driven last mile company that serves e-commerce companies in Sweden and Denmark, with the market’s highest delivery quality and customer satisfaction. We work to create the best delivery experience by optimizing logistics to be as efficient and environmentally friendly as possible 🌱. Our technical platform drives our logistics operations to ensure that thousands of consumers receive their deliveries on time every day.
   

  

 At Airmee, you’ll have the opportunity to join a rapidly growing company where innovation and sustainability are in focus. As an intern, you will take on a challenging and developmental role with real responsibility and the chance to apply your academic knowledge to practical projects. We see internships as a two-way opportunity: for you to grow and learn in a fast-paced environment, and for us to gain fresh perspectives and new ideas 💡.
   

  

 Together, we strive to create the best and most sustainable delivery option in the Nordics.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We offer students the opportunity to complete their practical training (LIA) as part of their studies and gain hands-on experience through an internship with us at Airmee, where you will learn how technology and customer support work together to deliver market-leading quality. For this internship, you will practice in the area of AI bot development and customer experience, focusing on building and optimizing our Intercom chatbot that supports thousands of customers every day.
   

  

 Are you curious about how automation and AI can shape the future of customer service? Excited to design and optimize chatbot flows that help customers quickly and smoothly? Or perhaps eager to learn how technology, logistics, and customer experience intersect? If this sounds like you, then do not hesitate to join us on this transformative journey and let’s learn and redefine success together! 🚀
   

  

**What will you do?**
 Based On Your Background And Interests, You Will Run Your Own Project Where You Will Be Challenged In Independent Project Work Chosen Together With Your Supervisor At Airmee. Examples Of What You May Do
   

  

* Design and improve conversational flows in Intercom to make them clear, helpful, and human-like.
* Test, analyze, and optimize the bot’s performance.
* Work with integrations between Intercom and Airmee’s systems (e.g. order and delivery data).
* Ensure customer experience is always in focus, even when interactions are automated.


**Specialization**
 This Internship Is Tailored For Students Who Want To Work At The Intersection Of Technology And Customer Experience. Depending On Your Background, You May Focus More On
   

  

* Bot building & integrations (for students in Computer Science, Data Science, or Software Engineering).
* Conversation design & UX (for students in Interaction Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Communication, or Service Management).


 Either way, you will work as if you were part of the team, solving real challenges that impact our customers.
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
**We Are Looking For Ambitious Individuals Who**
* Are currently studying in a relevant field (Computer Science, Data Science, Interaction Design, UX, Communication, or similar).
* Have a genuine interest in AI, automation, and customer experience.
* Can work independently and enjoy problem solving.
* Thrive in a fast-moving international work environment.


**Meriting But Not Required**
* Previous experience with Intercom or chatbot platforms.
* Basic programming skills (JavaScript, Python, or similar).
* Understanding of APIs and integrations.


**Practical information**
* Internship: Full-time
* Location: Stockholm, Hötorget
* Compensation: This is an unpaid internship in line with academic LIA requirements.
* Working hours: Mainly 9am–5pm, with flexibility depending on your study requirements.

title: Business Analyst
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Technology, Information and Media
description:

**I hope you are doing good.**

 Main responsibilities Lead the work of gathering requirements from the business and other stakeholders. title: Senior UI designer (Temporary – 1 year), Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Be a part of creating the digital customer experiences of the future with us at PostNord as a member of the UX/UI team in Stockholm!
   

  

**Join us**
 We, the UX/UI team, are working in an agile environment where the team independently owns the product from start to finish. Within the team, it is important that everybody has their say, and we always strive to improve our way of working.
   

  

 Our UI designer will be on maternity leave, and we need to find a temporary replacement to cover her responsibilities during her one-year absence.
   

  

 Our head office is in Solna, Stockholm. Three days a week we make sure to meet each other in our office in Solna.
   

  

 Find out more and follow us on LinkedIn!
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Take lead responsibility for maintaining and evolving our multi-brand, multi-platform design system.
* Collaborate with designers, developers, and product managers to implement system components efficiently across web and native apps.
* Maintain and improve Figma component libraries, ensuring documentation is complete, accurate, and easy to use across the organization.
* Ensure accessibility and WCAG compliance in all design system components.


**Must haves**
* Experience building and maintaining design systems in a large organization, ideally for multi-platform environments.
* Hands-on experience with design tokens and tools such as Token Studio (or similar), plus understanding of token implementation in code.
* Strong Figma skills, including advanced component and variant creation.
* 4–5 years’ experience as a UI designer with at least 1+ years focused on design systems.
* Excellent collaboration skills with cross-functional teams (UX, Dev, Product).
* Strong understanding of accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
* Fluency in Swedish and English, spoken and written.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with HTML, CSS and JS.
* Understanding of IT processes such as Scrum, Kanban, and Agile.


**We offer you**
* A great team, you are both part of the market web team but also a bigger team with a focus on customer-facing solutions at Postnord.
* Agile is our way of working; we have daily meetings, refinement meetings, and sprint retros.
* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* To be part of a large organization with endless development opportunities for you as a developer and individual.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless of if we lead ourselves or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity, and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? I welcome your application. Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email panos.makrostergios@postnord.com. Please note that we will not accept any applications sent by email. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: UX Research Lead | Candy Crush Soda Saga
description:
**Craft:**
 UX & UI
   

  

**Job Description:**
 We are seeking a highly experienced UX Research Lead to join the Candy Crush Soda team. This role will be responsible for centralizing UX research efforts, optimizing research operations, and driving a cohesive research strategy that aligns with Soda’s business goals. The UX Research Lead will manage a team of researchers, prioritize research initiatives, and foster the craft development of the UX Research team.
   

  

**Your Role Within Our Kingdom**
 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Strategic Leadership: Establish and drive a centralized UX research strategy and roadmap for Candy Crush Soda. Develop clear prioritization frameworks to allocate research resources effectively based on business needs and impact.
* Team Management & Craft Growth: Provide direct line management, career development support, and performance coaching to UX researchers, ensuring a strong research team culture. Foster the development of the UX Research craft by implementing structured learning opportunities, mentorship programs, and best practice sharing.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner closely with game designers, product managers, data scientists, and other stakeholders to ensure research insights drive product innovation.
* Standardization & Best Practices: Define and uphold high-quality research standards, ensuring consistent methodologies, reporting, and impact measurement.
* Communication & Advocacy: Champion user research within the organization, advocating for a player-centric approach to decision-making and product design.


**Skills & Experience**
* Extensive experience in UX research, ideally within gaming or mobile applications.
* Proven track record of leading and growing UX research teams.
* Strong ability to collaborate, influence, and drive alignment across multiple teams and stakeholders.
* Expertise in a wide range of qualitative and quantitative research methodologies.
* Experience in setting up research operations, including tooling, documentation, and resource planning.
* Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills.


**About King**
 With a mission of
 *Making the World Playful* 
 , King is a leading interactive entertainment company with more than 20 years of history of delivering some of the world’s most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry, including the world-famous Candy Crush franchise, as well as other mobile game hits such as
 *Farm Heroes Sag* 
 a. King games are played by more than 200 million monthly active users. King, part of Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), has Kingsters in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Dublin, San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles and Malta. More information can be found at King.com or by following us on LinkedIn, @lifeatking on Instagram, or @king\_games on X.

title: Product Owner
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**In Search Of a Product Owner who’s hungry to shape what’s next in video commerce with a world-class team by your side** 




  





 At Bambuser, we’re transforming how the world shops online by bringing video commerce to life for some of the world’s most loved brands.
 



 It doesn't matter if you’re early in your career or already have plenty of experience. What matters is hunger. Energy. The drive to spot opportunities, rally people, and ship products that make a difference.
 



 We’re a small team with big ambitions and capabilities. You’ll be right at the center – working with senior devs, designers, and customer-facing teams to uncover opportunities, test ideas, and launch products that create real impact for our users and our business.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Own projects from idea through launch and follow the impact
* Talk to customers and our internal teams to spot opportunities worth building
* Test ideas quickly (no need to design yourself, but you know how to validate fast)
* Write clear, simple specs and work closely with your dev team
* Help bring focus and prioritization in a fast-changing environment
* Share results openly – what worked, what didn’t, and what you learned.
* Drive measurable impact: adoption, engagement, revenue.



  





**Who You Are** 




 We believe you will thrive if you…
 


* Have experience as a Product Owner, Product Manager, Associate PM, or similar role (or you’ve built your own side projects and have something to show for it)
* Know how to build products in cross-functional teams with engineers, designers, CSMs, and sales
* You don’t just make decisions, you make them stick. You explain the why, rally the team, and turn tough calls into shared momentum.
* Can turn user insights into ideas worth testing
* Bring just enough structure to help us scale without slowing us down
* Think in terms of user value and business outcomes, and how to balance them
* Communicate clearly with senior developers and understand technical trade-off
* Are comfortable using tools like Figma, GA, Miro/Notion (or similar)



  





**Bonus If You…** 



* Have been an engineer yourself or studied engineering
* Have worked with e-commerce, video, or SaaS tools
* Have side projects, hackathon experience, or things you’ve shipped just for fun
* Are excited about AI, automation, or rapid prototyping tools
* Have startup or scale-up experience



  





**Who You’ll Work With** 




 You’ll be part of a small, tight-knit product team led by our VP of Product & Innovation. Your closest collaborators will be our engineers (R&D), our designer, and stakeholders from Customer Success and Sales.
 



  





**Why Join Bambuser?** 




 We combine the impact and pace of a scale-up with the creativity of a startup. We’re not just another SaaS company. We’re building the future of video commerce. At Bambuser, you’ll have the freedom, trust, and tech firepower to move fast and build things that matter.
 



  





**How to Apply** 




 Forget buzzwords and laundry lists. Tell us what excites you about this role! Show us how you've driven real impact in previous product work. Applications are reviewed continuously.
 



  





 At this time, we’re only considering candidates located in the Stockholm area who already have the right to work in Sweden (no visa sponsorship required)

title: Copywriter, Interim
description:
*Sellpy is looking for a copywriter to join its creative department for a one-year parental leave cover. Someone who can generate strong ideas and turn them into words that move people.* 




  





 In this role you’ll be part of concept work from the start – developing campaigns, cracking insights into ideas, and giving them shape with copy that cuts through. Some days you’ll craft headlines and scripts, other days you’ll be pitching new routes together with art directors and designers. Always with the aim of making second hand the natural first choice.
 



  





 You combine creativity with structure. You can work independently but thrive in collaboration, building on others’ thoughts and pushing your own further. You enjoy switching between formats, from big-picture campaign ideas to detailed copy edits. And you know how to find the words that make people stop, think, and act.
 



  





**In short, you will** 



* Ideate campaign concepts
* Compose decks and present ideas to stakeholders
* Write copy for campaigns, ads, and the website
* Contribute to various photo shoots



  





**You need** 



* 5+ years of experience in copywriting
* A track record of ideating and writing for ads, video scripts, CRM, UX, and social
* Marketing insights, cultural awareness, and fashion industry know-how
* Experience working with copy and translations in larger ad frameworks



  





**We’d be impressed if you are** 



* Experienced in generative AI tools for copy and content production



  





**You’ll get to** 



* Be part of a young brand that’s driving change towards a sustainable lifestyle. In return, you’ll get direction, energy, and the chance to work on meaningful challenges on a daily basis.
* Work closely with a creative director, two art directors, a copywriter, a designer, a motion designer, a project manager, and a junior designer.



  





**Location** 




 You are welcome to do all these things at our office at Medborgarplatsen in Stockholm, and from home. We hope that you are based in the Stockholm area for you to attend campaign shoots and similar events.
 



  





**Hybrid work** 




 We work in a flexible hybrid setup, spending at least half of our time together in the office to keep ideas flowing and the team spirit strong
 



  





**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time, temporary parental leave cover
 



  





**Start:** 
 1st of December 2025
 



  





**End:** 
 December 2026
 



  





 Send in your application and a link to your portfolio and let’s take it from there.

title: Digital Traffic & Conversion Analyst
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Internet Marketplace Platforms, and Software Development
description:
**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a data-driven and results-oriented
 **Digital Traffic & Conversion Analyst** 
 to join our team at Barnebys. In this role, you will be responsible for monitoring, analyzing, and optimizing traffic and conversions, for both B2B and B2C, and ensuring good user experience for our visitors. You will also own the analysis of visitor data, engagement patterns, and site-wide trends to provide insights that enhance the overall user experience and drive business growth.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Track, manage, and optimize traffic flow and conversions across Barnebys, ensuring traffic acquisition objectives are met.
* Monitor and report on campaign performance (organic, paid, and referral traffic), providing actionable insights to internal teams and clients.
* Analyze visitor behavior and engagement across the platform to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement.
* Develop and maintain dashboards and reports that track site-wide traffic, conversion rates, and user engagement metrics.
* Provide strategic recommendations for increasing qualified traffic and improving conversion rates across Barnebys' channels
* Conduct A/B testing and other optimization experiments to enhance user experience and boost engagement.
* Stay up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in digital marketing, analytics, and user behavior.



  





**Requirements** 



* Proven experience in web analytics, traffic analysis, and conversion optimization (2-4+ years preferred).
* Strong understanding of website performance metrics and key conversion KPIs.
* Proficiency with analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and similar platforms.
* Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, Power BI).
* Ability to translate complex data into clear, actionable insights for both internal stakeholders and clients.
* Familiarity with SEO, SEM, and digital marketing strategies.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Detail-oriented, analytical mindset with a passion for continuous optimization and improvement.



  





**What We Offer** 



* A dynamic, collaborative work environment at the intersection of design, auctions, and technology.
* Opportunities to work with leading auction houses, galleries, and dealers from around the world.
* The chance to make a real impact on client success and user experience.



  





**Working Location** 




 We value in-person collaboration and expect regular presence at the office in the city center of Stockholm.
 



  





**About Barnebys** 




 At Barnebys, we're not just changing the auction industry – we're revolutionizing it. As a cutting-edge tech company and an independent market place, we're building a world-class ecosystem for art, antiques, and collectibles, and we need passionate, talented individuals to help us shape the future.
 



  





 Our platform supports every step of the auction process – from registration to bidding and is trusted by industry leaders. With over 600,000 items available for sale, a comprehensive database of auction results, and powerful valuation tools, we are the go-to solution for collectors, galleries, and auction houses worldwide.

title: SEM Consultant
description:
**Job description** 





 We are looking for people to join our experienced SEM team in Stockholm where we have an average of 8 years of experience working with Google Ads. We are searching for a SEM Consultant with 2-4 years of experience in Paid Search.
 




  






 We are looking for an entrepreneurial type of person who is suited to working in a small team environment and wants to contribute to building and growing our company. You should have a positive attitude and drive to learn and develop.
 




  





**Key responsibilities** 



* Translate client business goals into a comprehensive paid media strategy with measurable KPI:s.
* Collaborate transparently with clients, guiding them confidently toward elevated performance marketing.
* Own, execute and optimize PPC campaigns (primarily Google Ads, Microsoft Advertising).
* Proactively identify growth opportunities, test hypotheses and scale successful tests.



  





**Ideal candidate** 



* Demonstrated experience in Google Ads.
* Hungry to find and keep up to date with new industry technologies and tools to ensure new opportunities are tested and implemented where appropriate.
* Proven track record in executing sophisticated and successful search media plans and strategies.
* Attention to detail and strong organisational and prioritisation skills to manage multiple work requests and projects in our company wide tools.
* Outstanding analytical skills, data-driven approach. Proficiency in Sheets/Excel (pivot tables, xlookups and general data management).
* Understanding of where paid search fits in the online and offline marketing mix.
* A team player who contributes with ideas, feedback and positive energy.



  





**Requirements** 



* Full Google Ads and GA4 Certification.
* Fluent Swedish and English communication skills (verbal and written), additional languages are advantageous.
* At least 2+ years of experience in Search Marketing with proven track record in PPC, both hands-on operational level experience as well as strategic planning.



  





**Nice to haves** 



* Knowledge and experience in technical areas like programming (e.g JavaScript, Python, PHP), basic scraping and Google Ads-scripts.
* Knowledge and experience in other digital areas (SOME, SEO, Analytics, Tag manager, CRO/UX, SA360, Programmatic).



  





**What we offer you** 



* Flexible working hours and possibility to work remotely.
* Brand new office in Södermalm (from January).
* A fun entrepreneurial work environment.
* Senior colleagues with deep technical skills, in all aspects of digital marketing.
* To challenge and develop your knowledge and skills.
* Be a part of building a disruptive agency.
* Endless love from our office dogs.
* Health care allowance.
* Attractive pension plan & insurance coverage.
* Hybrid office.
* AW:s, culture club, team events, conferences.
* Your choice of PC or Mac and phone (Apple/Android).
* Snacks, coffee and chilled drinks at your disposal!



  





**About Rocket Revenue x 56K Digital** 





 Rocket Revenue and 56K Digital have merged to create Sweden’s most specialized performance marketing agency, working with over 150 clients in more than 20 countries.
 





 By combining leading expertise in Paid Social, CRM/Marketing Automation, and creative content with deep specialization in Paid Search, Tracking, and Analytics, we’ve built a complete growth ecosystem where strategy, technology, and creativity come together.
 





 As one agency, we are shaping the future of performance marketing — blending technical know-how, creativity, AI-driven innovation, and a true understanding of our clients’ businesses.
 




  






 We’re an equal-opportunity employer and value diversity. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds and identities.
 




  





**Apply** 





 Send your CV and a short cover letter to
 
 petter@56kdigital.se
 
 and
 
 simon.liljenas@rocketrevenue.se
 
 . (If you have case studies or an account portfolio summary, we’d love to see it.)

title: Senior UX Researcher - Games
description:
We are looking for a talented and passionate Sr. User Experience (UX) Researcher to work with cross-functional teams to design and execute research, understand the motivations of our players, gather insights that inform design, and grow our ability to utilize qualitative feedback for product decisions
   

  

**Example Of Responsibilities**
* Plan and conduct user research for Embark products using a combination of qualitative and quantitative methodologies, including playtesting, usability evaluations, survey studies, and player interviews.
* Partner with studio and game leadership teams to translate research findings into actionable insights that inform market strategy, core game design, feature prioritization, and the overall product roadmap.
* Embed into game projects and work alongside Designers, Product Managers, and Engineers to continuously understand the user experience and to plan impactful user studies to improve the quality of the product.
* Be an advocate for the player in product conversations by identifying root causes behind player needs and behaviors, in order to deliver relevant recommendations for improving the product.
* Collaborate with researchers, data scientists, business analysts, and other insights stakeholders to tackle cross-functional insights requests to stakeholders on all levels of the organization.
* Manage a small UX Research team, and mentor other team members (including designers and producers) on research best practices. Help to build and scale research to foster a culture of continuous customer-centric learning.


**We would love if you have**
* A creative and curious mind with a passion for games and games user experience.
* 6+ years of hands-on experience in UX research or an equivalent role, preferably from the gaming industry, including experience integrating user research into product design.
* Demonstrated ability to lead research projects that have had a measurable impact on product strategy and design decisions.
* Analytical skills with the ability to take a variety of primary and secondary source materials such as telemetry analytics, survey results, user behavior, and best practices to craft actionable and unbiased recommendations.
* Solid comprehension of the benefits and limitations of different research methods, including when and how to apply them during the product development process.
* Knowledgeable about user research in games and user centric development for consumer applications.
* Master’s degree or higher in Cognitive Science, Statistics, Human- Psychology, Computer Science, Computer Interaction, another or related field or equivalent working experience.


*This is an on-site role, and we are only considering candidates already residing in Sweden.*
 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

title: Software Engineer - Mobile
description:
**Description & Requirements**
 Electronic Arts creates next-level entertainment experiences that inspire players and fans around the world. Here, everyone is part of the story. Part of a community that connects across the globe. A place where creativity thrives, new perspectives are invited, and ideas matter. A team where everyone makes play happen.
   

  

 Electronic Arts creates next-level entertainment experiences that inspire players and fans around the world. Here, everyone is part of the story. Part of a community that connects across the globe. A place where creativity thrives, new perspectives are invited, and ideas matter. A team where everyone makes play happen.
   

  

 EAX In-game Experiences team is responsible for EA Connect, our social overlay facilitating cross-platform party, voip, quick messaging and game invites, used in most EA Sports titles. We are also responsible for the new Spotify integration recently released in FC 25.
   

  

 We are looking for someone to help us build experiences like this, both on mobile devices and consoles/PCs, using JavaScript and React..
   

  

 You will be based in the Stockholm office in a hybrid work environment. You will report to an engineering lead in the team.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will primarily be working with feature development in JavaScript, using TypeScript and React Native.
* You will also be working in React using an embedded JavaScript engine that connects to a C++ SDK in the game engine.
* You will help develop products used in multiple EA games
* You will partner with game teams and ensure the code works on several platforms, always with an eye on performance.
* You will be part of the broader engineering group, and an important contributor to the EAX team based in Sweden.
* You will design systems and APIs and contribute to technical design and reviews


**Qualifications**
* 7+ years of JavaScript programming experience
* Experience with frontend development
* Experience using TypeScript
* Experience using React Native


**About Electronic Arts**
 We’re proud to have an extensive portfolio of games and experiences, locations around the world, and opportunities across EA. We value adaptability, resilience, creativity, and curiosity. From leadership that brings out your potential, to creating space for learning and experimenting, we empower you to do great work and pursue opportunities for growth.
   

  

 We adopt a holistic approach to our benefits programs, emphasizing physical, emotional, financial, career, and community wellness to support a balanced life. Our packages are tailored to meet local needs and may include healthcare coverage, mental well-being support, retirement savings, paid time off, family leaves, complimentary games, and more. We nurture environments where our teams can always bring their best to what they do.
   

  

 Electronic Arts is an equal opportunity employer. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We will also consider employment qualified applicants with criminal records in accordance with applicable law. EA also makes workplace accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities as required by applicable law.

title: Clinical Validation Specialist
description:
*RaySearch develops innovative software solutions to improve cancer care. About 1000 clinics in more than 40 countries use RaySearch software to improve treatments and quality of life for patients. RaySearch was founded in 2000 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. The headquarters is located in Stockholm, with subsidiaries in the US, Europe and Asia - Pacific. Today we are more than 400 employees with a common vision of improving cancer care with innovative software. Our great staff is crucial for our success and we offer a fantastic working environment in modern offices, flexibility and good opportunities for development. We believe in equal opportunities, value diversity and work actively to prevent discrimination.*
 RaySearch develops a suite of cancer care software, and we are now looking to add more talented employees to our oncology information system RayCare, specifically to our treatment integration team which is responsible for the development of integrations with third-party treatment delivery devices.
   

  

**About RayCare**
 RayCare is a client-server application that runs on premises at many clinics all over the world. RayCare takes care of and helps clinical staff to coordinate their work at the clinic. For example, workflow management, patient chart details and treatment management. RayCare is an innovative oncology information system (OIS) designed to support the complex challenges of modern oncology clinics. It is developed to streamline workflows in cancer clinics to facilitate efficient care faster to more patients. RayCare is used by all staff at the clinic, e.g., physicians, physicists, treatment planners etc. and is used in all steps of patient care, from registration to radiation treatment at the treatment machine and for treatment follow-up. RayCare is integrated with RayStation and its treatment tools but also with external products and supports communication via HL7 as well as DICOM.
   

  

 In the Treatment Integrations team, you will validate and provide feedback on RayCare's integrations with external third-party treatment delivery devices. As part of the Treatment Integrations team, you will have the opportunity to work on a crucial part of the system while gaining insights into various treatment devices, their capabilities, and their integration. Collaborating with talented colleagues, you will contribute to creating high-quality, reliable, and safe integrations.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Clinical Validation Specialist, you will work closely with integration developers and treatment device vendors and play a key role in ensuring the clinical accuracy, safety, and usability of RayCare’s integrations with third-party treatment delivery devices. You will verify that the software meets requirements and validate clinical workflows, ensuring it aligns with real-world clinical use cases. You will also help identify potential gaps in functionality or safety. Working as part of the treatment integration development team, you will design and execute test cases using treatment simulators and onsite devices, analyze results, provide actionable feedback, and report deviations.
   

  

**Your profile**
 You have a keen eye for detail and a methodical approach, enabling you to evaluate complex clinical workflows and ensure their accurate representation in software, identify discrepancies and assess the real-world impact of proposed solutions. You have knowledge of the treatment planning workflow and its effect on treatment course design and delivery. By taking ownership of your work, you ensure that every aspect of the clinical verification and validation process is thoroughly executed from test design to reporting results. You value collaboration and share clinical insights to improve the different treatment integrations.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Master’s degree in Medical Physics or equivalent.
* Experience with medical software and integration testing in a medical software setting.
* Clinical experience in Radiotherapy and treatment delivery including Oncology Information Systems and Treatment Planning Systems (at least 2 years).
* Experience working with radiotherapy treatment delivery devices .
* Ability to travel to different locations for onsite validation and testing with vendors and clinical users.
* Detailed oriented and strong problem-solving skills.
* Excellent interpersonal skills and fluent English, both in written and spoken.
* Ability to work independently and take initiative when performing validations in clinical settings.
* Analyze complex workflows and define test cases.


**Our Culture**
 Culture at RaySeach is the driving force behind our organization, where everything we do is driven by a shared passion for innovation and the fight against cancer. Our dedication is reflected in our ability to deliver exceptional results, pay close attention to detail, and consistently go the extra mile. Our employees stand out as experts in their field, driven by a relentless focus on solving problems -no matter how complex. At RaySearch, we take pride in leading the way in cancer treatment, leveraging cutting-edge technology to develop innovative solutions that make a real difference in patient care.
   

  

**Our Offer**
 At RaySearch, we offer a diverse and inclusive work environment, fostering openness, sincerity, and collaboration. Located in Hagastaden, Stockholm's Life Science Hub, our modern and creative workspace includes an in-house gym, yoga, and social activities like ping pong, table football, and regular after-work events. Our bistro serves a fantastic lunch buffet, and we offer morning- and afternoon-fika every day. Our rooftop terrace also provides a stunning 360-degree view of Stockholm, enhancing the work experience. All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package.
   

  

**Application**
 Please apply to the position through the application form below. We do not accept applications by e-mail. Selection and interviews will be ongoing.

title: Lead Game Designer - Games
description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Lead Game Designer to join THE FINALS game team here at Embark, a team that is currently numbering around ~100 developers.
   

  

 As a Lead Game Designer at Embark, you will be responsible for detailed design work on the project, as well as instigating and reviewing the designs of other designers. You will collaborate closely with the directors of the project, in refining concepts and ideas into tangible designs, prototypes and features, as well as working with Production leadership in helping in articulating and establishing estimates, project scope and timelines.
   

  

 We would like you to take on managerial responsibilities for some of the projects’ Design staff, as well as coach and mentor the projects Game Designers in design methodology and documentation practices. And inspire them to deliver high quality, balanced and scalable systems and player experiences, fitting for Live Service and Free-to-play PvP Action Games.
   

  

 You will also own and spearhead game features directly, and work hands-on in cross disciplinary teams while implementing gameplay features
   

  

**We would love if you have**
* A creative and curious mind.
* 10+ years of experience designing and making games and a proven track record with multiple shipped titles.
* An excellent grasp of AAA PvP gameplay and systems design, including knowledge of player psychology, UX design, gameplay mechanics and dynamics.
* Proficiency with the Unreal Engine and experience with Blueprints and scripting.
* Able to adapt to varied learning and communication styles of team members and stakeholders.
* A good knowledge and familiarity with the various game maker disciplines, coding, animation, game physics, 3D Art, etc.
* Enjoyment of creative collaboration in cross disciplinary groups.
* Professional English communication skills.


 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

title: Executive Assistant & Communication Support, Global Communication, Volvo Group Digital & IT
description:
Volvo Group Digital & IT is looking for an experienced Executive Assistant to support the Head of Communication and the Global Communication team.

  

The Digital & IT Communication team, led by Mélanie Lagerström, builds engagement in the Digital & IT Community in becoming the digital capability of Volvo Group and contributes to the positioning of Volvo Group as an industrial digital leader.

  

We do it by creating understanding and excitement around Digital & IT strategic priorities and the Digital Transformation, aiming to become trusted partners and advisors to the Chief Digital Officer (CDO) and the Digital & IT Executive Management Team, and advocates to our colleagues.

  

We are responsible for building, creating and executing the Volvo Group D&IT Communication strategy and plans. This includes internal and external communication, using various channels (Violin, Viva Engage, Events, Social Media …), and focusing on our key topics such as the Digital Transformation, AI, Sustainable IT as well as Employer branding. This function works in tight cooperation with all functions within Volvo Group Digital & IT, Volvo Group Connected Solutions, as well as colleagues within Volvo Group communications.

  

We are a highly engaged, multi-cultural and experienced team and we are looking forward to onboard a new colleague.

**About the position**
----------------------


This is a rare opportunity to support a dynamic global team and contribute to strategic communication initiatives. The role has the responsibility to assist and support with administrative tasks, to be the sounding board to the Head of communication and to coordinate and drive own projects.

  

You report to the Head of Communication and will be part of the global communication team, and also part of the Executive Assistant Network within Volvo Group Digital & IT.

  

In this role, you will both be the Executive Assistant of the Head of Communication, but also assist the global communication team with administrative tasks and various support:

  

As EA to the Head of Communication, you will:

  

* Take ownership of the Head of Communications agenda: coordinate with key stakeholders to book complex meetings, book travels and secure an updated agenda.
* Proactively obtain and organize information necessary for meetings, speeches, and presentations.
* Edit, proofread and format documents and research incl. basic authoring/drafting of correspondence.
* Coordinate and assist the global communication team meetings and other key Digital & IT governance meetings, incl. room bookings, lunches, dinners, agenda, minutes and follow-up on actions and decisions.
* Manage administration, e.g., travel administration, purchase orders, invoices, and other expenses.
* Assist visitors with practical support.

  

As assistant in the Global communication team you will:

  

* Support with Ariba order/reception (Purchasing system)
* Support in booking meetings with Executive Management Team (EMT) and/or Leadership Team (LT)
* Assist with event preparation and organization, including tasks such as booking meetings in connection with events and coordinating logistics
* Review and update distribution lists, such as PPDLs (2x a year)
* Secure the team Teams/sharepoints are well organized and updated.
* Maintain and update various presentations and content on Violin and/or EMT sharepoint (eg Volvo Group Digital & IT company presentation, Pre-boarding page, Onboarding PPT material incl. org. charts…)
* Adhoc projects depending on the needs.
**Who are you?**
----------------


To be effective in this position we think you should have or be:

  

* You bring over 5 years of experience supporting senior executives with confidence and discretion.
* You are a proactive problem-solver with a keen eye for detail and a passion for excellence.
* You have a strong business acumen and a clear customer-centric mindset and are experienced in handling a wide range of administrative and executive support.
* You thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt quickly to changing priorities.
* You pay attention to details and have a high level of professionalism; you deal directly and forthrightly with people and problems; you are driven and focused on getting the job done.
* You are tech-savvy, with stong skills in Microsoft Office, SharePoint/Teams, SAP/R3, Ariba, SuccessFactors, and emerging AI tools.
* Good at planning and organizing.
* You actively strive for continuous development of your capabilities in the role.
* You are fluent in English (written and spoken)
* Bonus: Experience in multimedia support or communication tools is a plus!
**Are we the right match for you?**
-----------------------------------


Volvo Group values are Customer Success, Trust, Passion, Change and Performance. If you believe that they are keys to success, you might be our new Executive Assistant. You will have the opportunity to work together with highly skilled colleagues in an exciting global environment which provides opportunities to develop both professionally and personally. We believe our new Executive Assistant is above all an effective coordinator and team player, embracing all aspects of diversity, safety, quality, and the environment.

  

If you are ready to make an impact with our dedicated team, we´d love to hear from you. Apply now and become part of our exciting journey! Last application date is 30th September 2025.

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

We are committed to shaping the future landscape of efficient, safe, and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents across the group’s leading brands and entities.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, you will be working with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to be able to leave our society in better shape for the next generation. We are passionate about what we do, and we thrive on teamwork. We are almost 100,000 people united around the world by a culture of care, inclusiveness, and empowerment.

 **Group Digital & IT** is the hub for digital development within Volvo Group. Imagine yourself working with cutting-edge technologies in a global team, represented in more than 30 countries. We are dedicated to leading the way of tomorrow’s transport solutions, guided by a strong customer mindset and high level of curiosity, both as individuals and as a team. Here, you will thrive in your career in an environment where your voice is heard and your ideas matter.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: IT Arkitekt
description:
#### **Försvarsmaktens digitala vägar måste ständigt ses över, förbättras och ibland även byggas om helt. Vi stärker nu vårt "byggteam" som hanterar it-system som används för materielrelaterad informationshantering och inom olika logistikfunktioner med ytterligare en it-arkitekt.**


**Om enheten**

Teknik- och vidmakthållandekontor Ledningssystem (TVK Ledsyst) uppgift är att ta tekniskt designansvar för Försvarsmaktens ledningsstödsystem under hela livscykeln.



Enheten, som är under tillväxt, har sin huvudverksamhet förlagd till Ledningsregementet i Enköping. Inom TVK Ledsyst finns Taktisksystemavdelning, där Logistik IT sektion är organiserad. LogITs har vidmakthållande- och designansvar för it-stödsystem som används för materielrelaterad informationshantering samt olika logistikfunktioner inom hela Försvarsmakten. Som IT-Arkitekt arbetar man även med gränsytor gentemot FMV:s PLM-system.


**Om befattningen**



IT-Arkitekt är en befattning inom TVK Ledsyst som stödjer Designansvarig med att säkerställa tillgänglighet, säkerhet och användbarhet av materielen över tid samt stödjer it-ansvariga roller i t ex realiseringsprojekt med din kompetens.



**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**


* Deltar i utvecklingsprojekt, t ex i kravställning gentemot nya it-lösningar.


* Analyserar nuvarande it-landskap och föreslå ändringar i syfte att nå ökad effektivitet och informationssäkerhet.


* Granskar systemlivscykelplaner och stödjer Designansvarig med analys.


* Bereder designbeslut till Designansvarig samt andra typer av beslutsunderlag.


* Deltar i omvärldsbevakning inom PLM, PDM, ECM, SCM och ERP.



**Kvalifikationer**


* Akademisk examen inom sakområdet it-arkitektur som arbetsgivaren bedömer som relevant för tjänsten. Alternativt motsvarande kompetens, förvärvad utifrån lång yrkeserfarenhet inom sakområdet it-arkitektur.


* Mycket god förmåga att kommunicera i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska kring sakkområdet it-arkitektur.


* B-körkort.


**Meriterande**



- Yrkeserfarenhet informations- och datamodellering inom sakområdet it-arkitektur.


* Yrkeserfarenhet av analysera och föreslå designlösningar inom sakområget it-arkitektur.


* Yrkeserfarenhet av att arbeta med analysera av lagar, standards och motsvarande och ta fram förslag till design av dataflöden i it-system som underlättar för verksamheten att efterleva lagkrav och standards.


* Yrkeserfarenhet av produktgranskningar och produktutvärderingar av it-system med mål att se vilket system som motsvarar verksamhetens krav bäst.


* Yrkeserfarenhet erhållen inom Försvarsmakten eller Försvarsmaktens Materielverk (FMV).


**Personliga egenskaper**

Du har lätt för att samarbeta med andra. Stor vikt kommer att läggas på personlig lämplighet.


*För att myndighetens uppdrag ska vara framgångsrikt förutsätts att alla medarbetare uppträder enligt den värdegrund som finns. Försvarsmaktens värdegrund slår vakt om alla människors lika värde, rättvisa och jämlikhet och främjar demokrati och mänskliga rättigheter (läs mer på www.forsvarsmakten.se).*


**Tjänsten erbjuder**


* Kompetensutveckling utifrån verksamhetens behov och dina karriärsmål, cirka 2-4 veckor per år.


* Tre timmar träning i veckan på arbetstid.


* Bra balans mellan arbete och fritid med flexibel arbetstid samt 28 - 35 semesterdagar beroende på din ålder.


**Övrig**

Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning. Försvarsmakten tillämpar 6 månaders inledande provanställning.



Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid.



Arbetsort: Enköping. Resor förekommer till andra orter i Sverige och inom försvarsalliansen NATO.



Tillträdesdatum: 2026-01-01 eller enligt överenskommelse. Individuell lönesättning enligt Försvarsmaktens avtal. Vi tar löpande in kandidater på intervju under ansökningstiden.


**Kontakt**



För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Sektionschef Catharina Lundberg eller Personalgeneralist Malin Lindqvist. Båda nås via växeln 0171-15 70 00.


**Fackliga företrädare**

ORF/O – Magnus Johansson


SACO-S – Carl-Johan Pettersson


SEKO –Christian Hedberg


OFR/S – Clarence Arnstedt


Samtliga nås via växeln 0171-15 70 00.
company_description: Försvarsmakten är en svensk statlig förvaltningsmyndighet som ansvarar för landets säkerhet.

title: Kvalificerad utbildnings- och systemadministratör
description:
Har du erfarenhet av att administrera och utveckla LMS-system samt förvalta webbutbildningar? Drivs du även av att skapa tydlighet och struktur samt leverera hög service gentemot slutanvändare? Då kan du vara rätt person för denna tjänst. Vi arbetar för att göra skillnad, inte enbart för våra målgrupper inom hälso- och sjukvård, tandvård samt socialtjänst, utan också för alla i behov av vård och socialtjänst i Sverige.

  


**Om tjänsten**



Din arbetsplats kommer vara på enheten för kunskapstillämpning. Enheten ansvarar för att utveckla och förvalta metoder och arbetssätt för att stödja implementeringen av bästa tillgängliga kunskap inom hälso- och sjukvården och socialtjänsten, med fokus på att göra största nytta för våra målgrupper och bidra till en jämlik vård och omsorg. Myndighetens lärplattform med tillhörande webbutbildningar utgör ett viktigt stöd för målgrupper i deras arbete att omsätta Socialstyrelsens kunskap i praktiken.

  



Du kommer ingå i ett team med enhetens andra utbildningsadministratör och enhetens förvaltningsledare. En viktig uppgift för teamet just nu är att upphandla ett nytt LMS då nuvarande avtal snart löper ut samt att ta fram effektiva rutiner för förvaltningen av lärplattformen och dess utbildningar.

  


**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**


* operativ drift och underhåll av vår lärplattform
* användarsupport
* publicering, kvalitetssäkring och löpande underhåll av webbutbildningar och klassrumsutbildningar i vår utbildningsportal
* enklare arbeten i vårt författarverktyg
* sammanställning och presentation av användarstatistik
* utbilda och stötta myndighetens kursadministratörer
* bidra till kontinuerlig systemutveckling och implementering av funktionalitet

  



Vi lägger stor vikt vid din erfarenhet och kompetens inom systemadministration för att du ska kunna ta vara på de funktioner vårt LMS erbjuder och kunna vara delaktig i vårt kontinuerliga utvecklingsarbete.

  


**Om dig**



För att lyckas i arbetet behöver du vara serviceinriktad, strukturerad och noggrann. Det är också viktigt att du kan arbeta självständigt och då rollen innebär många kontakter såväl internt som externt behöver du ha god samarbetsförmåga. Vid rekryteringen kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.

  


**Vi söker dig som har**


* gymnasieexamen eller annan utbildning som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant
* mycket god vana vid arbete i digitala läroplattformar (LMS)
* tidigare erfarenhet av arbete i författarverktyg
* mycket goda kunskaper i samtliga Microsoft Office program
* erfarenhet av att skapa och presentera enklare statistiska rapporter
* god vana att samverka både internt och externt
* god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska.

  


**Det är meriterande om du har**


* arbetat inom kommun, region eller statlig myndighet
* erfarenhet av arbete i Docebo
* erfarenhet av arbete i Adapt builder
* erfarenhet av arbete med SCORM
* erfarenhet av arbete med tillgänglighetsanpassning (WCAG)
* kunskap om gällande dataskyddslagar (GDPR).

  


**Bra att veta**



Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid och inleds med provanställning i sex månader. Du utgår ifrån kontoret på Västerbroplan i Stockholm men har möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till två dagar i veckan. Din tjänstetitel blir administratör och din placering är på avdelningen Kunskapsstyrning för socialtjänsten, Enheten Kunskapstillämpning.



När du ansöker får du besvara ett antal urvalsfrågor som är kopplade till kravprofilen i annonsen. Dina svar används som en del av urvalsarbetet och kan avgöra om du går vidare i rekryteringsprocessen eller inte. Det är därför viktigt att du svarar så utförligt och tydligt som möjligt. Vi använder oss inte av personligt brev vid urvalet, därför bifogar du endast ditt CV.



Om du har frågor om tjänsten, kontakta enhetschef Anna Kessling anna.kessling@socialstyrelsen.se Vid frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta personalspecialist Rebecka Modahed rebecka.modahed@socialstyrelsen.se

  



Fackliga företrädare för SACO-S är Isabelle Ålander, isabelle.alander@socialstyrelsen.se Facklig företrädare för ST/OFR är Anders Nordlund, anders.nordlund@socialstyrelsen.se Samtliga nås på tel. 075-247 30 00.



Har du skyddad identitet? Kontakt angiven personalspecialist ovan.

  



Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 25 september 2025.

title: Strateg med inriktning informationssäkerhet
description:
Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.


Stadsledningskontoret är kommunstyrelsens förvaltning. Vi ansvarar för styrning, uppföljning och utveckling av stadens verksamheter utifrån den vision och budget som kommunfullmäktige har beslutat om. Vi är drygt 350 anställda som i huvudsak arbetar med strategiska frågor som har stor betydelse för stadens verksamheter.


### **Välkommen till oss**


Säkerhetsavdelningen inom stadsledningskontoret ansvarar för central ledning, samordning och utveckling av hela stadens säkerhetsarbete. Avdelningen leds av en säkerhetsdirektör och innefattar tre enheter. Avdelningen ansvarar bland annat för att utveckla stadens krisberedskap, planering för civilt försvar, risk och sårbarhetsanalyser, säkerhetsskydd och informationssäkerhet samt strategisk samverkan inom och utom organisationen i beredskaps- och säkerhetsfrågor. Säkerhetsskydds- och informationssäkerhetsenheten har ett särskilt ansvar för hela stadens informationssäkerhetsarbete vilket inkluderar stadsledningskontorets egna informationssäkerhet. Enheten och leds av en enhetschef och har 10 medarbetare. Verksamheten är i en intensiv fas kopplat till utveckling av cyberområdet, ny lagstiftning, omvärldsläget och behovet av beredskapsförmåga tillsammans med totalförsvaret.

### **Vi erbjuder dig**


Det här är en roll för dig som vill vara med och stärka Stockholms Stads säkerhetsarbete och särskilt informationssäkerheten. I rollen har du stora möjligheter att påverka och bidra till utvecklingen av informationssäkerhetsarbetet på stadsledningskontoret och i förlängningen resten av Stockholm stad.


I den här rollen är fokus på informations- och it-säkerhetsarbetet i staden. I ditt uppdrag kommer du arbeta strategiskt och praktiskt med både stadsledningskontoret samt genom stöd till stadens förvaltningar och bolag. Det är både ett förvaltande och utvecklingsinriktat arbete som ska fungera både på förvaltningen och i samverkan med resten av staden. Säkerhetsfrågorna är högt prioriterade och har ett starkt fokus hos oss. Du ingår i en enhet med engagerade kollegor och hög kompetens inom området. I det fortsatta utvecklingsarbetet söker vi en strateg med inriktning informationssäkerhet och hoppas att du vill vara med och bidra i detta viktiga arbete.


Läs mer här om Förmåner för medarbetare i Stockholms stad.

### **Din roll**


Uppdraget präglas av en komplex struktur där information och it-tjänster förvaltas både centralt och lokalt av flera leverantörer, samtidigt som ansvar för information och personuppgifter är utspritt mellan olika förvaltningar och bolag. Din roll blir att skapa god dialog med dessa parter för att planera och stödja det operativa informationssäkerhetsarbetet.


Du behöver kunna prioritera, planera och hitta effektiva arbetssätt inom ett stort och komplext verksamhetsområde. Som god kommunikatör ska du kunna föra säkerhetsdialoger med olika aktörer – informationsägare, systemägare, leverantörer och verksamheter – och samtidigt driva arbetet framåt med ett pragmatiskt förhållningssätt.


Arbetet omfattar bl.a. implementering av säkerhetsåtgärder, stöd vid incidentutredningar, utbildning, sekretess- och riskbedömningar samt utveckling av åtgärdsplaner mot hot och sårbarheter.


I tjänsten kan ingå att tillsammans med övriga medarbetare på ett rullande schema vara stadens tjänsteperson i beredskap (TiB).

### **Din kompetens och erfarenhet**


Vi söker dig som har:

* aktuell erfarenhet av praktiskt och strategiskt informationssäkerhetsarbete baserat på ISO 27000
* goda kunskaper om de svenska lagar, regler och föreskrifter som gäller inom informationssäkerhet
* goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift.


Det är meriterande om du har:

* erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med certifiering för ISO 27000
* erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med dessa frågor för IT
* dokumenterad utbildning i informationssäkerhet och beredskap.


Vi fäster stor vikt vid dina personliga kompetenser och söker dig som är prestigelös, tar stort ansvar för ditt arbete och har förmåga till helhetssyn. Du är analytisk och noggrann med förmåga att prioritera och strukturera ditt arbete. Du tycker om att skapa kontakt med andra människor och bidrar till ett gott arbetsklimat i arbetsgruppen. Vi ser även att du har pedagogisk förmåga, är en god stilist och har vana och är bekväm med att tala och presentera i större och mindre sammanhang.


Välkommen med din ansökan!

### **Övrigt**


Eftersom tjänsten är placerad i säkerhetsklass är det en förutsättning att du är svensk medborgare. Vi genomför säkerhetsprövning inför tecknande av anställningsavtal.


För att matcha rätt kompetens till rätt jobb använder vi oss av tester. Forskning visar att arbetspsykologiska test, som personlighets- och kapacitetstester, är en av de bästa metoderna. Vi strävar efter en fördomsfri, jämförbar och objektiv rekryteringsprocess där arbetspsykologiska tester är ett komplement i helhetsbedömningen. Du som söker ett jobb hos oss ska vara trygg i att vi fokuserar på att bedöma de kompetenser som är avgörande för jobbet du har sökt.


Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.  



Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/5189 | Kontakt: Sébastian Tabrizzi, enhetschef 08-50829018, Desirée Nyman, rekryteringskonsult 08-50811728, | Facklig företrädare: Katina Staf, Vision 08-50829192, Andreas Meschke, SACO 08-50829589, Jan Svensson, DIK 08-50829321, | Publicerat: 2025-09-11 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-09-26

title: Informationsarkitekt till Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens informations- och IT-arkitektur inom hälso- och sjukvården? Vi söker nu en ny kollega till vårt team på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

**Du erbjuds**
--------------

* möjlighet att arbeta i en central och strategisk roll med stort inflytande
* en dynamisk och innovativ arbetsmiljö där samarbete och utveckling står i fokus
* chans att bidra till och forma framtidens IT-arkitektur
* kompetensutveckling och kontinuerligt lärande
* en kultur som värdesätter nytänkande och kunskapsdelning.


Självklart får du också ta del av våra generella förmåner som Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset erbjuder dig.

**Om tjänsten**
---------------


I rollen kommer du att arbeta nära verksamheten, arkitekter och en rad andra roller inom IT, med fokus på att utveckla och implementera en ändamålsenlig och hållbar arkitektur. Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka på riktigt och delta i olika typer av arbeten, så som att analysera informationsbehov till att forma framtidens dataplattformar och informationsflöden.

**Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer bland annat bestå av att:**

* utveckla och implementera strategier för informationsarkitektur och Enterprise arkitektur inom organisationen
* ansvara och utveckla arbetssätt och metoder för informationsarkitektur
* analysera och dokumentera verksamhetsförmågor samt identifiera förbättringsmöjligheter
* skapa och underhålla modeller som beskriver organisationens nuvarande och framtida informations- och IT-arkitektur
* stödja projekt och initiativ genom att säkerställa att arkitekturen möter verksamhetens krav.


Du kommer också att ha en central roll i att leda och samarbeta med övriga arkitekter inom IT, där du bidrar till att utveckla en samverkande och innovativ kultur. Lika så kommer du jobba tätt med enheten hälsoinformatik som är ett kompetensteam med hälsoinformatik och informationsarkitekter. Genom att koordinera insatser och dela expertis säkerställer du att arkitekturen i organisationen är sammanhängande och väl integrerad i den teknologiska utvecklingen.


Du kommer vara en del av vårt EA-team, men även andra team där informationsperspektiven behöver stärkas. Allt i syfte att skapa förutsättningar för en datadriven organisation och, i synnerhet, att driva vår resa mot målet att bli en informationscentrisk organisation.

**Vi söker dig som**
--------------------

* alltid arbetar med helhets i fokus, tar stort ansvar för ditt arbete, för ett strukturerat arbetssätt och ser lösningar på problem
* är drivande, vågar ta för dig och ställa frågor
* har integritet, är professionell och har en god kommunikativ förmåga som gör att du kan förklara tekniska koncept på ett pedagogiskt sätt för olika målgrupper
* har ett prestigelöst sätt och har en god samarbetsförmåga.

**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


Krav:

* Relevant examen, exempelvis inom IT, datavetenskap eller informationshantering
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete från en liknande roll
* Djup kunskap om informationsmodeller, datastandarder och enterprisearkitekturprinciper
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av olika lösningar kring information och data
* God analytisk förmåga och vana att arbeta med komplexa system och strukturer
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


Meriterande:

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med arkitekturramverk, så som TOGAF eller Zachman Framework
* Erfarenhet av arbete med verktyg för informationsarkitektur såsom Enterprice Architect
* Certifiering inom informationsarkitektur, arkitekturramverk
* Erfarenhet av att leda workshops och utbildningar inom områden relaterade till informationsarkitektur och Enterprisearkitektur
* Färdigheter inom dataanalys med verktyg som Tableau och erfarenhet av att designa och optimera dataplattformar
* Erfarenhet av att integrera olika datakällor, säkerställa datasäkerhet och kvalitet
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med att realisera och arbeta med dataprodukter
* Erfarenhet av att koordinera arbetsgrupper eller projektteam inom tekniska områden, med fokus på att skapa goda förutsättningar för samarbete och resultat
* Erfarenhet av användning av AI i större organisationer.

### **Om rekryteringsprocessen**


Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande under ansökningstiden.


I samband med din ansökan behöver du bifoga CV. Istället för ett personligt brev ber vi dig besvara urvalsfrågor samt kort motivera varför du passar för rollen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan - Tillsammans är vi Karolinska!


Inför tillsättning av befattning som innefattar vård av barn och ungdom, kontrolleras den som erbjuds tjänsten mot misstanke- och belastningsregistret. Här kan du läsa mer om rekryteringsprocessen och om vilka kontroller som utförs på Karolinska.  

  

Som anställd på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset kan du komma att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om vad det innebär här.  

  

Om du är eller tidigare har varit anställd i Region Stockholm kommer vi att ta interna referenser från din nuvarande eller tidigare chef, om du blir aktuell för anställning.
  

  

För tillsvidaretjänster kan provanställning komma att tillämpas.  

  

**Om Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset**  

Vi på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset är stolta över att vi är ett av världens främsta universitetssjukhus. Förutom vårt särskilda ansvar för den högspecialiserade vården i Stockholmsregionen är huvuduppdraget att tillsammans med Karolinska Institutet utbilda framtidens vårdanställda och bedriva världsledande forskning samtidigt som vi fortsätter vårt arbete med att utveckla vården för patientens bästa. Vi arbetar inom en rad olika områden och professioner.
  

  

Vår vision - Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag.  

  

Läs gärna mer om oss på karolinska.se och följ oss på sociala medier!


Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen. Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss i Region Stockholm


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Solna | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/5559 | Kontakt: Sofia Lång Janstad 072-2542217, | Facklig företrädare: Vision sektion Karolinska vision.karolinska@regionstockholm.se, | Publicerat: 2025-09-11 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-10-02
